61a7: cig kha dum par gyur to/ / sbed pas ji ltar 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur par shes nas des bsams pa/ 'di gsang bar bya'o snyam mo// yang bsams pa gal te 'di bsad par gyur na yul 'khor gnyis 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur
61a8: bas bdag gis bud med kyi lus kyi phyir ci'i phyir bram ze gsang bar bya snyam nas de btang snyoms su bzhag go/ / de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sbed pas 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas skrag ste khyim nas byung zhing gzhan na 'dug pa dang //

61b1: sbed pas smras pa 'char ka khyod ci'i phyir rang gi khyim spangs te gzhan na 'dug tshur shog/ 'di khyod rang gi khyim yin gyis ci bder 'dug shig/ de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ don gyis na 'dis bdag la rjes chu gnang do/ ma du rig nas de nyid
61b2: na 'dug ga/ / 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab nas ko sa la byung ba'i rgyal po gas la rgyal gyis de la bu med pa'i phyir nar thams cad
61b3: rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug go/ / sred mas 'char ka la gang gi tshe bdag gi khyim thab gson zhing 'dug ste 'tsho zhing sdod pa de'i tshe na khyod rtag pa kho nar byon na/ dade dus la bab ste ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu ma mchis pa'i
61b4: slad du nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar stsal na/ da khyod kyis bka' mchid tsam yang mi sprid dam zhes yi ge spring ngo // de nas 'char ka spring yig gi don zos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag der song bar gyur na gzhi de las 'chang /
61b5: bud med kyi phyir der song ngo zhes gzhan dag kha zer bar 'gyur gyis bdag gis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas des lan gnyis sam gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste byin nas
61b6: rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi kham kyi rgyal po thams cad 'dud cing thams cad kyis pho nya dang / dkor sbom dag gsol nas/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams
61b7: cad grub pa rgan po dang / nang pa dang / gum pa gzigs nas thugs byung ste nags su gshegs pa de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis po nya dang / dkor sgrom
61b8: 'bul ba rgyun bkum nas lhas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya dang / dkor sgrom dag bka' stsal cing bskur nas de lta de ltar rkyen par gyur pa las de yal bar bor na slad kyis gnod pa chen por 'gyur ba de skol dang mtshams

62a1: a/ / 'brel par mchis pas de dang lhan cig rkyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so// 'char ka gal te de lta na khyod nyid po nyar song shig/ lha bka' bzhini 'tshal zhes de nas 'char kas dkor sgrom dag khyer te mnyan yod ga la ba der 'phags
62a2: nas mtha gyis ma nya ya byin do/ nas chag 'i gam du sems desten pa la ban pa 'i bya ba rten pa snyen pa bsten par bya ba yin pa je dang por blon po rnams blta bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu rgyal po blta ste/ sbed pa'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o snyam nas/
62a3: des blon po rnams blta bar brtsams te smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis kho bo ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes pa da mi shes sam/ de khyim thab dus la bab nas ko sa la byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu med pa'i phyir de'i nor
62a4: thams cad rang gi mdzod dang / bang bar bcug pas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po la gsol ba byed kyis khyed kyis grogs gyis shig/ de dag gis de bzhin du khas blangs so// de nas 'char ka ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba
62a5: der song ste phyin nas/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas lan gnyis lan gsum du rgyal po'i bye ba dag dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas te/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal
62a6: rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha bdag gis gnas stsol cig/ 'char ka khyod sngon gang du zhugs/ lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i sdum par mchis so// 'char ka song la de nyid du zhugs shig/ lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab po// gal te/
62a7: de dus la bab na ci de'i khyim yang dus la bab bam/ lha de'i sdum pa ni dus la ma bab mod kyi 'on kyang de na stan tsam yang ma mchis so// rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis 'char ka'i gnas byin cig/ 'char ka phyir
62a8: byung ba dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci lags 'char ka la gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/ 'di ltar 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig mchid mjal bas don gyis na 'char kas sbed ma'i slad du lha la gsol ba lags kyis/ lha 'char ka ni

62b1: bram ze mdun 'den kya bu lags pas bram zen ma 'dod pazhin drugazung bar bgyi ba lags te/ 'di legs par bzung na rgyal po bas gtsang legs par bzang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos 'chang gathos te sus pa/ 'char gangs khyod
62b2: ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes par sngar ma shes kyis/ ra song la sbed ma dang / de'i khyim dang nor thams cad khyod khyer cig/ lha bka' stsal pa bzhini 'tshal lo zhes smras nas 'char ka sbed ma'i khyim gal ba der song ba dang / sbed mas 'char ka
62b3: 'ongs so zhes thos nas/ ske khang du 'dug ste ngu bar brtsams so// 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma khyod ci'i phyir du des smras pa/ bdag 'tshal ba'i khyim thab dus la bab na ci khyod kyis kyang yongs su gtang dam/ de nas 'char ka 'di
62b4: snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'thun par smras na 'di shin tu ngu bar 'gyur bas bdag gis 'di tshar gcad par bya'o snyam du rig nas 'char kas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa gang gis btsun mo
62b5: grags 'dzin dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dgas skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba de dag gi rkang pa'i rdul tsam du yang khyod kyis mi bod do// de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / 'char kas spras pa kho bos khyod ma ga
62b6: bas khyod nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'ongs pa yin no/ / kho bos rgyal po las khyod dang khyim dang / nor thams cad thob na ci khyod 'di nyid du 'dug gam/ ser skya'i gnas su 'gro/ des bsams pa/ gal te ser skya'i gnas su song na bram ze mo las
62b7: srog kyang mi thob bo snyam du rig nas 'di nyid du mchis so zhes smras te de de nyid du 'dug go/ / de'i tshe na 'char ka la khyim gnyis yod de/ gcig ni mnyan yod na'o// gcig ni ser skya'i gnas na'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub
62b8: sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de dka' ba byed pa ci yang med par rig nas/ ci bder dbugs rngub par mdzad cing der dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / 'bras chan dang zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol

63a1: par mdzad/ zhun mar dang 'bru mar dag gis su dag kyang sdud par mdzad/ chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing / grong sde 'dod du gshegs nas grong ba'i bu med ga mo dag stobs ma gnyis las lan bcu drug pas
63a2: pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa gsol te/ klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na rta bkra shis 'tshong ba las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi gzhig la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs
63a3: pa'i gdan bshams nas dkyil mo dkrur bcas te sku drang por srang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod pa/ ji srid zag med ma thob par// de srid dkyil dkrung gzhig mi bya// de yis ji srid zag
63a4: med pa/ ma brnyes dkyil dkrung 'jig mi mdzad// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gud thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang / bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon pa rab tul ste / bla na med/
63a5: pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud nas tshangs pas gsol te/ bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang / nye lnga dag dang grong pa'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba
63a6: lnga bcu btul to/ / kar ba si'i tshal gseb ta gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug bcu bden pa dag la bkod do// grong sde 'dod du gshegs nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do// ster rgyas
63a7: su gshegs nas ral pa can stong rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsten par mdzad do/ / mo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po de dag tshe 'phrul gsum gyis gdams pa mdzad nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bskal te shin tu mthar thug
63a8: pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/ / shar ba'i' tshal gseb tu gshegs nas ma gad+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+hA byung ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum/

63b1: phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag go// rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal ba zhes te shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do// mnyan yod dug sheg+sa/
63b2: nas rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul nas/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas
63b3: ke sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya btang ste/ lha dgyes pa skyed cig khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
63b4: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes spring ngo / / rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu bdag gis ring du ma mthong ste/ bdag gzhon nu mthong bas yongs su skom mo zhes gsol ba/
63b5: dang po nyid de nyid du rab tu byung ngo // pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang de yang 'di nyid du rab tu phyung ngo ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir gang dngag so nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo // de nas dus gzhan zhig/
63b6: nargyal po mas gis de thos nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha tse'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don
63b7: thams cad grub pa dka' ba dag spyod pa'i tshengs gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na de dag nyi ma re re zhing gtam khyer te 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gnas pa 'dis gnas so zhes gtam stod par byed na/ da gzhon nu don thams cad
63b8: pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing / mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shes thos nas ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na/ 'gas kyang gzhon nu don thams cad

64a1: gyu pa'i gtam khye temi 'ong ba gang dang gang banying gtang ba de dang dede nyid du 'dug par 'gyur nang ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtang ngas mas 'angs su nga cang mi 'dug tu rus 'char gas smras pa/ lha ba dag la bka' stsa du/
64a2: gsol/ khyod kyang der 'dug par 'gyur ro// lha bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis rang nyid kyis phrin yig 'di skad ces/ ma rum bzhugs pa tshun chad nas// bdag gis legs par
64a3: khyod bsrungs te/ / nyon mongs gdugs kyis rab gdungs pas// rgyal po'i ljon shing sdod cing mchis// slob ma'i yal ga rtsa lag gis// da ltar khyod ni rgyas gyur pas// gzhan dag bde bas dga' mdzad na// bdag ni sdug bsngal sten
64a4: par gyur/ / gang tshe dang po khyod 'khrungs tshe// shin tu don chen mdzad nas ni// nye du rjes su bzung mdzad ces// de tshe khyod kyis thugs dam bcas// de slang go 'phang zhi brnyes khyod// bdag dang nye du'i tshogs rnams la// rjes su thugs brtse nyer bzung
64a5: ste/ byon pa'i blo gros mdzad du gsol zhes bris so// de nas 'char ka phrin yig de blangs te mnyan yod du 'phags nas de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas ji tsam na 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la phrin yig du ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phrin
64a6: yig klag pa mdzad nas/ 'char kas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs sam/ 'char ka 'ong ngo // 'char ka sngon gyi gcugs pa de nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs na bdag gis
64a7: mthus bkri bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ gang la khrid byed sred pa yi// dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa// spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de// gang gi gzhir ni khrid par byed// glang la khrid byed
64a8: sred pa yeyi/ / dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa// rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de// gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed// gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni// 'jig rten ma rgyal yod med pa// spyod las gzhi med sangs rgyas de// gang gi gnyis ni khrid par byed//

64b1: ga rgyal nyas pang 'i// jig rtenam rgyas yo ma // rtsal lam gni dasas rgyas de// gang niganas ni byed par byed// 'char/ sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan dus pa gargyal lathas ga pa 'o// ma man ra kyis
64b2: pa/ 'char kargyal ba'i pho nya dag ni de lta bu ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das 'on rgyal ba'i po nya ga ji lta bu lags// skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gon pa rab tu byung ba dag yin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la spang mchi bar ma nyid kyis
64b3: 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab zung sa song shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon tshe bas rjes pa ded de dag sus ba dang / yum dang mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / tha ma'i gnas lhaT
64b4: dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcag pas bka' stsal ma thag tu 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka rab tu phyung shig
64b5: dang / de ni 'di la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ de la 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// 'di ni
64b6: khyod kyis bya ba ma yin no/ / 'char ka khyod kyis deng phyin cad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig khyim gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o// zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun du spyad pa'i chos thams cad brjod do// 'char kas mkhan po la bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan
64b7: pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
64b8: 'das ser skya'i gnas su mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka khyod kyis tshamatshom med par rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par mi bya bar sgor 'greng ste shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te shAkya'i dge slong

65a1: gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes 'dri na/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te zhugs shig ces zer na 'jug par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba
65a2: nyid yin nam zhes 'drin/ cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal ba'i pho brang du gnas 'cha' bar mi byed dam zhes 'dri
65a3: na/ gnas 'cha' bar mi byed do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed ces 'dri na/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'od dam zhes 'drin/ 'ong ngo zhes brjod
65a4: par bya'o/ / gal te yun ji tsam na 'ong zhes 'drin zhag bdun 'das nas so zhes brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
65a5: gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // 'char ka 'ong ba'i tshe mnyan yod du nyi ma mang po dag gis byin na phyir 'gro ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i
65a6: mthus nyi ma gcig gis ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod song la rgyal po la shAkya'i
65a7: dge slong 'ongs so zhes sbron cig des smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/ 'char kas smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do// sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya 'jug
65a8: tu chug shig/ su zhig shAkya zlog par byed/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo bas ro shes nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod la bcom ldan 'das/

65b1: ma cag gas nga// rnam pams gsang gis pa gan mas gsanas smras pa/ khyod yang gnanapa/ dag sungs da/ la// rgyal las smras pa/ gan don thas cad thub pa yang mas na
65b2: yinapa/ lha lags di 'dra ba nyid lagasas// rgyal po seng ge'i khrisas brgyal tes la lpa nas chus dang bsrung bas srog byer 'angs nas dris pa/ gzhon nu na thams cad grub pa 'ongs/ sgyum ci'o// yu rim
65b3: no / dgung bdun das nas so// rgyal pos blod po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan da la rgyal po'i bo brang dang / btsun po'i 'khor dag / sbyi da gyis shig/ lngagazhon nodon thams cad grub pa rgyal pa'i po zang dam/ brgyan
65b4: 'khor gyi nang du gnas 'cha' bar mi bgyid do/ / 'on gang druganas 'cha'ababyed/ dgon pa'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o// gtsug lag lang ci 'dra ba// 'cha gas mnyan yodan gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba dag
65b5: de ba rjodado/ / de'i nargyal po zas gtsang la bskyed pos tshal skye lod dang / n+ya so ng+ge'i kun dga' ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa pa snang pos tshal ldab gyi yod pas rgyal pos rtsod po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan /
65b6: ngas byed mos tshal gsum pa skye sod da/ bo k+shi na dga' bdang tshangs pa'i gnas dag su bskyed pos dz+wal yang d+ha'i byid kyi tshul 'dra ba'i gtsug lag 'a 'a ca s+m+R+YuM dang /
65b7: 'od pa dag srung byed du can/ grong bye bar bya gnas thams cad kyang rdo dang gisagam dang khyo med par gnas pa gyis shig/ rgyal pon pa sa ni cig gis 'grub bzhig/ snyan pa sa kyis bzhin thong na 'a /

66a1: skyed patsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas bskyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu bskyed
66a2: mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang khang chen bcu drug dang / / bang pa'i ga'i drug bcu yod pa dag byed tu bcug cing grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / kye mo med par gnas par byas so//
66a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsor zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis gdon mi za bar bgyi ba bcu mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du sangs rgyas su lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du
66a4: sems can gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems ma bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad ma btul ba dang / ji srid du sku tshe'i cha lnga pa ma lus pa dang / ji srid nga mtshams bcad pa
66a5: ma mdzad pa dang / ji srid dunya thos zung gcig mchog rnam bstan pa dang / ji srid du grong khyer kun bong du lha las babs pa ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du mnyan yod du tshe'i phrul chen po rnam par ma bstan pa dang / di sri da mtsho
66a6: chen po ma dzes par nyan thos rnams dang thabs gcig sngon gyi las kyi chu ba lung ma bstan pa dang / ji srid du yab yum gnyis bden pa dag la ma bkod pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dab ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
66a7: 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po zas gtsang dang / shAkya 'bum phrag dram dag gdul ba'i dus nye bar gnas par gyur cing 'dis ste/ yab yum gnyis bden bdag la gzhag pa de ri de ba'i gshegs pas gdod
66a8: mi za bar mdzad pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis/

66b1: gapas gang de ba'i gshegs pa dang bas gcig ser bya'i gnas su 'thob dang / yab dang sras das pag bang slo das chom gas dan pang shing maldan gags dang napa padag pa ste/ dathas parda pag na pan
66b2: bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams pa ca dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser bya gnas su gshegs kyis byed cag sa s+ya gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gci/ seng gA'i gnas su 'thob dang / yatha nga blam
66b3: mjal blta bar spro ba des chos gos dag yang shig ces bsgo'o/ / dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin pa kyi zhes tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po mas mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dral pa khor dul pa dang ma
66b4: zhi 'khor zhi dang ldanapa/ grol ba por grol pa dang ldan pa/ dbugs byin pa 'khor lugs byin pa dang ldan pa/ shul ba 'khor bul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor bdod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/
66b5: mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ zhu mchog sar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che gar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar pa re ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ga
66b6: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha'i lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs
66b7: su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ngu ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan sar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar chod pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi
66b8: tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po skar blon pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba star rgyu gar rtsi tshogs kyis yongs su bkong ba/

67a1: sa sar 'od bar stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskur ba/ yul la bar sung skar dri ba 'chags kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags smras pa ltang thul bram gyi chags kyis yongs su bkar ba/ zan
67a2: yang kyar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bsod pa/ nod byin sa gad rten tshogs kyis yongs su ga ba/ bganas das lta ma sa yin gyi tshogs kyis yongasas bas ba/ y-in sgru u0f7f gam
67a3: tshogs kyis yo su 'askor ba/ tshangs paltar tshangs des tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin du ma ba/ spyad la ma dang / spyod pa la 'khrugs pa/ drug 'gyu cing ga/ smin sa
67a4: dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum brla rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcas su rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can sa/
67a5: nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzad pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten
67a6: la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig phra ba/ nyag gcig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la/
67a7: legs par bslabs pa/ rdul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhil mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las gal ba/ ru 'phrul ci gang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhil legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su
67a8: ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyams pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa

67b1: drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis me tog gis phyug pa lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur spyan
67b2: par yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung lo/ sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong
67b3: dang / tshedang ldan pa shA ri'i brid mod dgas kyi che chen po sogs pa dag srong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du ba dar te sar skya'i gnas gal ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma bdun pa la grong khyer ser skya'i gnas
67b4: thams cad rdob dang / gseg ma dang / gyom med par bzhag cing bdug pa dang / phye ma 'khrigs pa dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba la sogs pa mchod pa'i ye byad rgya chen po dag
67b5: bshams shing / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ba sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thams cad zla kham lta bur bshams te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi bar gri la ma thams cad mdzes shing
67b6: ba dang / gseg ma dang / rtse mo med par bzhag ste/ spos chu'i chag chag btab cing bar bar du dar gyi chun po mang po sbyangs shing / me tog gi tshems dag kyang bshams/ bdug spos dri zhim po'i dub 'khrigs pa dang /
67b7: metog sna tshogs bzam pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsred ba dag rnam par bzhag sa// rgyal po bas gas nyid sa rgya 'i rjo pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthuchen pos rgyas d+ha'i kun dga' yan rin te/
67b8: ldan 'das la stod cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu lung ro ta ka'i 'gram du gshegs so// de na dge slong kha cig ni lag pa dang rkang pa dgas dru bar byed/ kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed/

68a1: kha cig ni chu 'tshag par byed/ kha cig ni khrus byed do// grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ongs shing / rgyal po zas gtsang gis r+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ra sa
68a2: phyogs go skabs yangs par gnas mas bshams shes thos so/ / thos nas kyang shAkya 'bum phrag dum dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'dus par gyur cing / den kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul zhing lhags so//
68a3: kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes te rje dang por yab kyis sras kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad dam/ 'on te sras kyis yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa blta'o snyam pas lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
68a4: te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis ser skya'i gnas su gshegs na shAkya nga rgyal can dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas chen po ma rnyed de/ 'di ltar 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas
68a5: ' bum phrag du mas bsu ste steng gi nam mkha' las byung ste song na da 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs kyang rkang pas 'ongs so zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis ser skya'i gnas su 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing
68a6: rig nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byed ni kar pa dag gis chu krung ro ha ka rgol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs so// dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das
68a7: las mnyan nas/ rkang pa dag gis chu ku ro ha/ rgal te n+ya gro d+ha kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bul snyoms par zhugs
68a8: te/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na rdzu 'phrul gyis chu klung ro ha ka'i pha rol gyi 'gram nas mi sad par gyur cing steng gi nam mkha' la dad pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brgyad pa ltar mngon par 'phags nas ser skya'i gnas kyi steng nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba gal ba

68b1: der gshegs te byon nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i steng gi nam mkha' la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so/ / de na bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs logs su spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs/
68b2: pa dang / mnal pa dag mdzad do// me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang / ser po dag
68b3: dang / dmar po dag dang / dkar po dag dang / btsod ka dag dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo // cho 'phrul dag kyang rnam par ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar zhing sku'i stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab
68b4: bar mdzad do/ / sku'i stong nas me 'bar zhing su'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do// shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du mdzad do// de ltar phyogs bzhing /
68b5: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi ston par mdzad de// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po zas gtsang gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni de'i spyi bo chal ba bdun
68b6: ru 'gas par 'gyur la/ gal te rgyal po zas gtsang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gzugs par gyur na ni shAkya rgyal can dag ci'i phyir yab tu gyur pas sras kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par byed ces ma dad pa skye bar
68b7: ' gyur bas bdag gis ci nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus ma btung bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'bul mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas tal bdun sring
68b8: tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la gzhes shing / tal drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na bzhugs so// de nas skyes bu bdun srid tsam na gzhes shing skyes bu drug dang / lnga dang / baning

69a1: gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig srid tsam na gzhes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shAkya rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir de'i
69a2: tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang tshe khyod bltam dogs rab g.yos dang // 'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod snga ma btang dang // 'di dang lan gsum kun gzigs mkhyen ldan pa// sangs rgyas khyod kyi zhabs la bdag phyag
69a3: 'tshal/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas
69a4: rgyal po zas gtsang dang / bre bo zas dang / zas dkar dang / bdud rtsi zas dang / shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do// shAkya kha cig ni bcom ldan
69a5: 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ / shAkya kha cig ni thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas cang mi smra bar mtha' gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das
69a6: tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis khu bzhus pa/ dpa' bo bcibs pa grang po dang // tshabs dang shing rtas khab gshegs na// tsher bcas dag sa'i gzhi dgal// ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan
69a7: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / bdag de rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // yang dag stsol ba'i bzhon pa yis// nyon mongs tsher mas ma sbas par// sa gzhi kun du rnam par chu// rgyal pos gsol ba/ dpa' bo ldan mdag
69a8: ka/ / na bza' gsol bas na ma mdzes na// ngur smrig na bza' nub po dag/ di ltar khyod skus bzod par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po bdag gi khrel 'dzem pa'i// sram sbyang gos

69b1: gyon mdzes pa yin/ / gang gis thub pa'i gos gyon pa// zhi ba'i nags na mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal pos gsol pa/ brtan pa sngan cad gser snod nas// zhal zas ro mang ldan gsol nas// da ltar bsod snyoms ngan pa dag/ ji ltar
69b2: khyod kyi mgur du byon/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos ldan dga' ba dag gi zas// des 'byung ldan zhing mnyam bzhag yin// zas srad spangs kyang 'jig rten kun// rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed// rgyal pos//
69b3: gsol pa/ blo bzang khyod sngon yang thog gi/ gzhal med khang steng dus mthun bzhugs// nyag gcig nags na khyod bzhugs na// ji ltar bsnyengs dang bral bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
69b4: gau ta ma 'jigs kun rtsa dang srid// de dag bag nyal bcas spangs pas// mya ngan 'jigs bral nags gnas te// den bdag 'jigs ci yang med// rgyal pos gsol pa/ thub dbang khyod sngon rab dgyes pa'i//
69b5: khaban rtag tu khrus mchog mdzad// nags na nyag gcig khyod bzhugs na/ don 'byor khrus su dag bgyid// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gautam chos brjid bsod nams 'gram// rog sang ngas pas bsngags
69b6: pa ste/ / mi las mi gsher der bkrus pa// rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro// rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo rang gi pho brang na// gseng dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na// chab tshan tog dang bcas pa yis//
69b7: ji ltar khyod kyi sku khrus mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gau ta ma dang klung tshul khrims 'gram// dad pa bsil ba mkhas pas bsngags// mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa// rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro//
69b8: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/ zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing // 'jigs sbag gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur// yid 'byung gang nas skye bar 'gyur// zhus pa de ni bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan

70a1: xxx/ xxx
70a2: gal te de gsum yod min na/ / bdag kyang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal pos gsol pa/ shAci rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa// dpa' bo 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// khyod la gos pa mi mangs/
70a3: legs par 'khrungs pa legs pa lags// de nas rab dga' dang rgyas pas// drang srong dge 'dun skod byas te// bab dbang zhabs la mgos gtugs nas// bde gshegs kun nas rtog cing rjod// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
70a4: snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bus yon tan ma tshogs 'dis bu rtogs pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do nyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de bsas pa dang / bkal nyal dang / khams dang / rang ba/
70a5: thugs su chud nas/ 'di kar rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas sbyin sdig pa 'dod pa daN+Dal las kyang dargyal canam gtogs pa zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mang/
70a6: do// denas mog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni thun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phying mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa
70a7: thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhos pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun pa bab par rnam par gzhag par mdzad do// rgyal po zas gtsang ni
70a8: bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam su ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo // lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang / dartsal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo // lhas byin bden pa ma mthong zhing rje

70b1: satshal kyis nonapas smras pa/ tu bdag gis kyang da rjes sa ma par byed pa rnam gas pa na na/ bdag gis kyang da rtan thams das su dag pa byab pa sa/ shA gtug pa dzang bdag dran /
70b2: bdag gis de sazlas pa/ rdzas tsun thong gis bcom ldan 'das ni thayul che ba/ mthutsha yin kyis deg ma pang ga/ den pa debang mi sna ba 'dag go/ ma gnyis pa la / pas tshal gyi yo ngas phyogs gnams
70b3: par gdan thabs zla gsas/ bu ba shams pa byas nas/ dang yad bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bo bal po che'i tshigs de'i bsas pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chung nas 'daka rtsal ba zas gas dang /
70b4: lhas byin sdig pa 'ad pa brtsal las kya dang N+Dal can ma gtogs pa the ba zas la sogs pa baH bran mi drug stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar byur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad// da ni rtseg chags stong phrag mang po
70b5: nin+dan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'o pa'i zas pa/ kha cig gis na phyir mi 'angad pa'i 'bras bu/ kha c-ig/ gis ni rab gra blang sa nyon mongs pa thams cad spas bas dgra brtsam
70b6: xxx/ xxx
70b7: xxx/ xxx
70b8: xxx/ xxx

71a1: bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin gyis de sad ma zer cig/ de nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// nyi ma gsum pa la skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas sus phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bab sa
71a2: pa byas nas/ der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang / phag la nyal dang // khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang / lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa rgyal las kyang dang rgyal can la gtogs
71a3: pa bapra rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ / de na srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir
71a4: 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te 'khor de las phal che sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang
71a5: dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo // lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang / dmyal las
71a6: kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs na/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mi mthong ste/ se pa sa ha cang mtho ba dang
71a7: ha cang zhum pas so/ / de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa sngon cad lha dang mes mchod par gyur na/ da ni mis mchod cing lhas mchod par ma gyur to snyam du ha cang zhum par gyur par thugs su chud do//
71a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i phyir lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom

71b1: ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni zan srog chags grog sbur gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes la/ ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni rang
71b2: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na nyan thos la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i sra
71b3: du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i slad du lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa bzhed par mthong ngo // de nas 'dod
71b4: pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu'i lag pa bskams pa la rkyong bar byed pa 'am/
71b5: brkyang ba las bsum par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so//
71b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khang bzangs sgo bzhi pa sprul pa mdzad de/ sgo bzhi po dag tu 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dge sgo srungs su rnam par gzhag
71b7: par mdzad do/ / de nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su nyes
71b8: brten te 'bod do/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yon phyogs su nye bar brten te 'bod do// rgyal po

72a1: zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni nyin mo lan gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'grog/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nang bar sngar langs te khang bzangs kyi shang sgogal ba der song ba dang / yul 'khor drung
72a2: gis sbas pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par rjod cig/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshad kyis mi chud do// bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kha bon rgyal po chen
72a3: lo yul 'khor zung yin no/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi lce lkog la ba der song ba dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par thod cig/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'bal zhig latsham ston pa
72a4: mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ / bzhin bzangs khyod bu zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yin no// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi nub sgog la ba der song ba dang / mig mi bzang
72a5: gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig/ ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do// bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kha na
72a6: rgyal po chen po mig mi bzad yin no/ / de nas rgyal ba chen po zas gtsang khang bzangs kyi byad lkog la ba der song ba dang / rnam thos kyis bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod ci/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor
72a7: zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/ / bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig yin/ rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yin no// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
72a8: lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas khang bzangs shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul pa mdzad pa dang / 'di ltar

72b1: rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa me long gi gzugs kyi nang na 'dug pa ltar mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa
72b2: lta bu'i bu med do snyam mo/ / de na rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas rgyal po zas gtsang la chos bstan par brtsam pa mdzad do//
72b3: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs pa dang / da ltar rgyal po zas gtsang su la yang 'di lta ste/ da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam du ha
72b4: cad dga' bas sems kyi klud ha cang mtho bar gyur par thugs su chud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mod
72b5: gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ngo / / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
72b6: ridi skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa maud gal gyi bu tshur gshegs btsun pa maud gal gyi bu byon pa legs so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
72b7: skabs dbye ba mdzad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi ting gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te khyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ 'dra
72b8: ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag byed do// me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dag dang / ser po

73a1: ngag dang / dmang po dag dang / dkar po dag dang / btsod ka dag dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog la bu dag zung ngo // cho 'phral zung dag kyang rnam par ston te/ lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rkun 'bab par byed do//
73a2: sa kyid pas ma 'bang na las kyi ldan sa rgya ldan ya / dbyags mas pa ky-i sa kya byags su sags rdzu 'phrul ma 'dul ma
73a3: mngon par 'du bya ba dpyir bsdus man pa gams pa di la 'jug go/ / de nas rgyal po zas gsang gis che dang ldan pa maud dgal gyi gyichen po la 'di sa ces smras so// bdun pa maud gal mi badzin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dis
73a4: 'phrul cheb/ 'di ltar mthus pa gzhan dag kyang mchis sa sa/ de nasatshe dang ldan pa maud gal kyi bu chen pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa'i nyan thos mthu chag// gsum rig sems kyi rnam grangs shes// zag pa zad par gyur pa dang /
73a5: dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam dusams te/ bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig rngu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che bar mazad kyi/ 'di ltar nyan thos rnams la yang rdzu 'phrul che bdag yod do snyam nas/ de nas rgyal po zas
73a6: gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud snyoms par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa pod gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tha' gcigs
73a7: 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen cing / bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'dzis
73a8: tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ / des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes bzhin bcom

73b1: ldan 'das la brten nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge
73b2: skyo dang tham pa dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' ba shes dang / tsa lag gatshogs kyis kyangs bgyis te/ khras dang mchi ma'i rgya mtshon pagams/ rnam pa'i dag las ni bsngal/ ran mang gi so gni cwam mthangs da pa u0f7f
73b3: dashin gyi/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro dang / yi dgas nas ni rkang pa zung / lnga dang mi rnams kyi nang dran banag// 'bar pa ni mthang bgyis// thag ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la la pa'i ri'i rtse mo ci bra thob la
73b4: shes kyi rjes bcom ste dz+nyAn du zhugs pa'i 'bras pan rdzob pa/ btsun pa bdag na mngon par zhugs pa lags sa// btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la
73b5: rnabs su mches/ bdag ge bstan du gzung du gsol// deng sran chad nas dri srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba zag pa nas rab tu dad pas skyabs su mchi'o// tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/ bu bo bzad pas pa la ni// lan du pan bdags gang bgyi
73b6: xxx/ xxx
73b7: xxx/ xxx
73b8: rgya thamam sa ca gas pas pa mthongs pas dbang la smras pa/ gzhanan kyang kyis rgyal kying byang drug gis na rgyal pa'i dmang gis ngas par spyad pa sbyang / mang du tu mgrang sa'i dum tshum ngas da padag

74a1: ro/ / lha nam gzigs deng nyid do// lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi bdag gis gang gi gdugs la bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de nyid kyi gdags la bden pa dag mthong lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bre bo zas dang bdud/
74a2: rtsi zas la smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis khyed kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig/ da ni rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs pa spyad pa spyod do// ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol ngas bden pa mthong ngo // lhas na ma gzigs deng nyid do// lhas deng nyid
74a3: gzigs kyi bdag cag gis ches sngar mthong lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams kyis bu thu bo gang yin/ gzhon nu bzang ldan lags so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro// de'i tshe
74a4: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyin gcig mi chad par rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshed gsol ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gsangal pa can las rab tu byung ba dka' thub kyis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag mthong ngo // mthong /
74a5: nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag sems ni bzang ba yin na lus mi bzang ste/ dka' thub drag po dag gis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ci 'dra bar 'khor
74a6: yang de 'dra ba nyid du gyur na de lta na bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur lha 'khor los
74a7: skur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / khyed kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/ lha nabs 'bring bar 'gyur ro// 'ond gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad na khyed kyi bu dag ci'i phyir zhakhas 'bri mi sbeng / lha ci lags de dag rab tu
74a8: dbyung ngam/ rab tu phyung shig/ lha shAkya'i rigs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig/ lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya gzhan nu rnams kyis khyim re re nas re re rab tu dbyung bar bya'o//

74b1: shes dril bsgrags pa byas so// gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril bsgrags pa de'i tshe na bzang ldan dang ma 'gags pa dang / nam gu la sogs pa shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyar ba byung ngo // gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shArgyagazhon nu lnga brgya dang
74b2: du blang ba de'i tshen bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba ni rnyed pa'i phyi dang nye ba yin no zhes gsungs pas de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po zung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag gzhar gyi
74b3: phyir 'o na rab tu byung ba yin na gzhan kho na la chags so snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung ba gcad par bzhed nas sor skya'i gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der gshegs te/ mthar
74b4: gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / / 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs
74b5: bgos lhur bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ mthar gyis mnyan yod na bsod snyoms la rgyab na/ khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo // khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag
74b6: ring po len nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang brang brdungs te smras pa/ 'char gci'i slad du khyod kyis bdag spangs te rab du byung / 'char kas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpas btsun mo grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tshom dang ridags skyes la sogs pa bud med drag
74b7: khri spangs te rab byung ba ni shin tu dka' ba yin gyi/ rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi brab ci yod/ 'char ka bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de ltar gyis shig khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdu bar bgyi'o// 'char ka de der dras dang 'thun pa'i dus su 'ong 'ang smras pa/
74b8: spad ma rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ spad mas smras pa/ da dung khyim gyi bya ba legs par ma bsdus so// sbed ma dus de tsam gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i khyim gyi bya ba yang legs par bsdus par 'gyur ro// 'char ka der legs par bsdus te sang rab tu 'byung ngo // 'chang

75a1: ' di snyam du sngon yang bdag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par gyur pas gal te bdag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung bar gyur na drug sde dag gis dge slong ma rab tu byung ngo zhes rgya cher zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro snyapa
75a2: chu'agyod pa skyes nas de lung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs te 'dug go/ sbed ma yang bye de nyin par
75a3: khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste dris pa/ 'phags pa dag de gar mchis/ de su yin 'phags pa 'char ka'o// nga rgyal po'i khab du song ngo // sbed mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams
75a4: kyis smras pa/ spad ma ci'i phyir du/ 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi shig dang / bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni
75a5: bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so// dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sbed ma 'char ka spu gri'i phyir rgyal po'i khab tu song pas spu gri sar pas khyod kyi skra 'dreg par 'gyur ro// dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag
75a6: rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas de dag gis sbed ma du ba mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma ci'i phyir du 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi shig dang bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs
75a7: par bsdus te mchis na/ de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so// g.yengs ma dge slong dag su zhig dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed/ 'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma
75a8: rab tu 'byin par byed kyis tshur shog/ 'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyod rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// de dag gis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/ 'phags ma khyim bdag gi mchis brang sbed ma 'di

75b1: xxx/ xxx
75b2: lpags dang shur bu dang / shAr na dag ga zer cad kyang byas la/ de yang ltung bamed nag pa can 'gal zhigashes rab sa byung bar byung na de dang phrad du yang mi gang rnas su tsud pa skyes nas da bdaga' ba ni/ dra n+ya gnas pa 'is rnas so/
75b3: mnyan yod na nan zhugs shig mi dga' bzhin du dbyung gnas par khas blangs pa des lhung bzed dang chos gos mtshan byung ngu bcug ste dgag bye byas pa na dgag bye legs par byas so// dgag bye shin tu byas so zhes dbul po'i khab gal
75b4: ba der song ste/ mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang gi sgon lam la rnam par lta zhing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar s+ya ba/ smin ma 'byung ba
75b5: zhig 'ong bar mthong nas 'char kas bsams pa/ dge slong 'ong ba 'di gnas brtan gang yin bsu'o snyam nas/ ngas spras pa gnas brtan byon pa legs so// byon pa legs so phyag 'tshal lo// des smras pa/ slob dpan phyag 'tshal lo//
75b6: 'char kas 'di ni nan zhunas shig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes mkhan po yang mi shes pa zhig go snyam du shes nas 'char gas de gtsug lag khang du bcug ste/ smras pa/ gan zhugs khyedag las 'ongs des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so// rang
75b7: kas bsams pa/ gal te dang po kho nar sbed ma'i gtam dris na 'phya bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar snga phyir byas te dri bar bya'o snyam nas sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ji lta bcom ldan 'das gnad pa chung ba dang / nyam ba rdung ba dang bad ba dang snyun ma ma
75b8: ba dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes sam/ btsun pa 'char // de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang spun mi mnga' ba dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du

76a1: dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ / tshe dang ldan pa ji lta dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyamar bachung ba dang /
76a2: bde ba dang nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ ston pa la lta bar 'dod dam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor
76a3: dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas shing ston pa la lta bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa ji lta gnas brtan kun
76a4: shes kauN+Din+ya dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang nad med pa dang /
76a5: stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas sam/ btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/ gnod pa chung ba dang / nyam nga ba chung ba dang / bde ba dang nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas so// tshe dang ldan pa ji lta ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
76a6: gsal rgyal dang / blam khyen drang krung byin dang / rnying ba dang khyim padag gzung ma ri dgas 'dzin gyims gdang / legs skyes dag shes sam/ btsun pa 'chang ka de bzhin te shes so// tshe dang ldan pa 'on khyod kyis khyim bdag gi rlung mi sbed ma shes
76a7: sam/ btsun pa 'char ka shes ta de ni btsun pa 'chang ka'i sngon gyi chung ma yin no// rgan zhugs gtam shes so// de drang yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi zung ma yin rnam 'am/ de ni rab tu byung // sus rab tu byung kyi dgu'i bdag mchen mo gau ta m-is
76a8: 'chang kas bsams pad dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin na snyam nas smras pa/ rgan nugs chung shag rkang pa dag khrus shig ces des de la rkang pa bsku ba dang / lag pa bsru ba mang po byin nas des de'i srung bzed dang chos gsas

76b1: gang btsugs te zung mthon po la banag nas smras pa/ rkan zhugs gtsug lag khang 'di na zas dang bcas pa/ rnyed pa dang bcas pa yin gyis gtsug lag khang 'dir mngon par dga' bar gyis shig/ des spras pa btsun pa 'chang ka bdag na
76b2: mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te 'gro ba yin pas bdag gnas 'di mi 'dod do/ / 'char kas de'i mdun du sgo lcags dang lde mig khyog po dag bzhag ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gtsug lag khang
76b3: gnas pa dang bcas par bya'i mi gnas par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes smras nas mig lam du mi sdang bar song ste/ de mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan med du phyin nas 'char kas rang gi gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/ legs par
76b4: blugs lci bsar ba'i byug pas thugs te sgo bcad nas khri'i steng na gyi gan du nyal zhing skad kyi gdangs kyis kha ton byed cing 'dug go/ dge slong ma 'dun pa 'bul bdag lhags nas de dag gis de'i skad kyi gdangs thos nas de dag gis de la
76b5: phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka khyod gar bzhud bzhud/ 'char kas smras pa/ rgyal po'i khab tu'o// de dag dbyar khang du dong nas sbed ma la smras pa/ sbed ma dga' ba skyed cig/ khyod kyi slob dpon 'ongs so// kho mo'i slob dpon
76b6: gang 'char ka'o/ / de ji ltar kho mo'i slob dpon ci kho mos de'i gnanas blags sam/ g.yengs ma khyod kyis mi shes kyis dge slong ma rnams ni dge slong la dag mang du las kyis khyod sod la ltos shig/ sbed mas nas kyi dang phye dang khrus kyi tshal
76b7: dang 'brumar thogs te 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang nga song nas sbed mas 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo brdungs pa dang / 'char kas smras pa de su yin/ sbed mas smras pa/ bdag sbed ma'o// khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'ongs pa legs so//
76b8: bdag rung yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma lags sam/ 'o na ci yin bdag rab tu thubyung ngo // khyod sus rab tu phyung / 'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta mIs so// kho bo re shig bya ba de lta bu zhig zung nas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po'i kha

77a1: song na khyod la brtad pa ci byung ni de'i phyir khyod rab tu byung khyod kyi zhal nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par sdus la shog shig dang / kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes gsung nas/ bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na khyod
77a2: rgyal po'i khab du bzhud de/ rgal te bdag 'phags mas rag ma phyung du lags na bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags par 'gyur ro// 'char kas smras pa/ sbed ma ci kho bo bdag nyid kyi lag ngar la sos
77a3: 'debs par byed dam/ skye dgu'i bdag mo gau ta mIs rab tu phyung yang rung / kho bos rab tu phyung yang rung ste legs kyis nang du zhugs shig dang chos bstan par bya'o// sbed mas 'char ki'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun
77a4: du 'dug go/ / des de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ des de la ji tsam pa de tsam du chos bstan nas sngon gyi bgad pa dang / dga' bar byas pa dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dran par bya bar brtsams te/ sbed ma bdag cag gnyis kyis skyed
77a5: mos tshal dang 'dun sa dang / lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu zas 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang / bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang / btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dran nam zhes smras pa dang 'char ka kun du chags
77a6: par gyur to/ / ji lta ji ltar chags par gyur pa de lta de ltar dral to// bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /
77a7: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal na gnas bzhugs pa de shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la gal te bum
77a8: yin na dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o/ / sbed ma des 'char ka de chags so snyam du shes nas sbed mas smras pa/ slad rol du mchis te slar mchi'o// 'char kas bsams pa/ 'di bshad pa byed 'dod dam/ gci ba byed 'dod gor

77b1: mtsha/ skam nas de wA la/ sang shig/ sbed ma phyir byung nas shi dang cad brjes ta rtag par brtsams pa dang / 'char ka de ska la mkhas pa yin pas dam da'i sna thos nas de'i phyi bzhin du byung u0f7f/ dge stong
77b2: mgo reg mo gar 'bros shes de de'i phyi bzhin rgyug par brtsams pa dang / de la brla'i reg pas khu ba byung nas de kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ glang po che chags pa dang bral ba bzhin du bzhid dag nyid na 'dug go/
77b3: sbed mas de kun nas bkris pa dang bral zhing phyir log pa mthong nas 'di kun nas bkris pa dang bral lo snyam du rig nas drang du song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa gal te bdag
77b4: gis dang du blangs par gyur na bdag kyang dge slong mar mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur la/ khyod kyang dge slong du mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur ro// sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed la/ gzhan
77b5: srang na bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes legs par gsungs so/ / ji ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan ba srung bar byed ce na/ sten par byed pa dang / goms par byed pa dang / lan mang du byed pa dang / rjes su srung bar byed pa dang / reg par byed
77b6: pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa ste/ de ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed do// ji ltar gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed ce na/ tho mi 'tsham pa dang / mi gshe ba dang / mi 'tshe ba dang / rjes su brtse ba dang / rjes su snying
77b7: brtse ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis te/ de ltar gzhan spang ba na bdag nyid srad bar byed do// 'phags pa sham thabs 'di chur stsol bkru bar bgyi'o// 'char kas sham thabs de sbed ma la byin// sbed mas khra ba

78a1: de mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag gis lus kyi phyogs btsun pa 'char kas sngon ma mthong ba 'am sngon ma mnams pa 'am/ sngon ma byugs pa ci zhig yod na bdag gis dang du ma blangs pa ni ma legs pa
78a2: zhig byas so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes so/ / sbed ma de ltar rnam par rtog pa na de kun tu chags shing dral bar gyur pa'i sems kyis khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi sgor blugs so// sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis
78a3: mi khyab pas de la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ / de dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ sbed ma kho mo cag go khyod chos bzang po'i chos kyis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du 'gro bar sems kyi kho mo cag gis des khyod
78a4: gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas par mi sems so/ / sbed mas smras pa/ phu nu mo dag dge slong de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ gang tshun chad rab tu byung nas des kho mo la sngan chad lan 'ga' yang lag gis kyang ma thugs so//
78a5: de dag gis smras pa/ ma thugs na yang des khyod gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar byas na/ gal te blugs na des khyod gnas skabs ji lta bur byas par 'gyur zhes zer
78a6: ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod do/ / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma de ni pham par ma gyur
78a7: gyis 'di ltar phyogs dben par bzhag ste/ bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pa gyis shig dang / bu gzhon nu 'od srung zhes bya ba btsa' bar 'gyur zhing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/

78b1: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhon nu 'od srung de ni nga'i gtam sna tshogs dang / gtam snyan pa dang / spobs pa dge ba can rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
78b2: dgongs pa/ dge slong rnams kyi nyes dmigs gang yin pa de ni dge slong mnye du ma yin pa la gos rnyed pa 'khrur 'dzud pa las gyur pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang /
78b3: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos
78b4: rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed do// yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o// nye du ma yin pa la zhes
78b5: bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan cad ni nye du ma yin no// gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / ru gu la'i gos dang /
78b6: ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o// rnying pa zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang yin pa'o// 'khrur
78b7: 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur sdug pa byed du 'dzud na'o/ / 'tshed du 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du smug pa byed du 'dzud na'o// 'chag tu 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni/ than thal mos rdebs par byed du

79a1: 'dzud na'o/ / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas lhung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ de na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur
79a2: zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'tshed du 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'chag tu 'dzud na spang
79a3: ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzung ba dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'chag
79a4: tu 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma
79a5: yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / 'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'chag tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'khrur 'dzud pa dang /
79a6: 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/
79a7: 'chag tu 'jug pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas

79b1: gos rnying pa 'khrur 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ / 'tshed du 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'chag tu 'dzud na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur
79b2: brjod pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'tshod du 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'jud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'drud pa dang /
79b3: 'tsheng du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong gi dge slong ma nye dul yid gnyis zabs gos rnyengad pa 'khrur 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
79b4: 'tsheng du 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'chag tu 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du
79b5: 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'jud pa dang / 'chag tu 'jud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud pa dang / 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'chag tu 'dzud pa dang / 'chad du 'dzud dam/
79b6: 'khrur 'dzud pa dang / 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang / 'chag tu 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// las dang po pa dang / smos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba
79b7: med do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo ni med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

80a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba 'di ni rnyed pa rnams kyi phyed dang nye ba yin no zhes bka' stsal pa de na yang shAkya'i khyim nas rab tu byung ba de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas de dag shin
80a2: tu gos kyis tsha ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhag pa dag kyang 'chad par byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dus dang dus su chos bstan kyang de dag gis bden pa dag ma mthong
80a3: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir shAkya rab tu byung ba dag bden pa dag mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs na de dag shin tu gos kyis cha ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing de dag lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags
80a4: lug pa dag 'chang ba'i phyir te/ gal te ras shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams la smad na dpral dka' bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
80a5: pa/ dge slong dgang zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/ nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar ma bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
80a6: kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs
80a7: pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so// bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la
80a8: shugs pa na dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / de nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par de dge slong 'ga' yang mi 'gro'o// de'i tshen tshe dang ldan pa nye sde zla ba shol ma bor bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par las blangs la/ bcom ldan 'das ni zlab

80b1: shol bor bas dbar ljongs su gnas pa ranal gyis bzhes so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing / mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pas lhung bzed dang chos
80b2: gos thogs te mnyan yod ga la ba der chu zhing sod nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'tho ba na mnyen yod du phyin to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye ste lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkad pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ba dang / dge
80b3: slong drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde thig ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar kho na na don nyung ngus dag 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba 'dral bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// gzhan dag gi smras pa/ des de ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed
80b4: du gzhug go/ / gzhan dag gi smras pa/ de ltar sbyor ba la 'jug gis gang gi tshe dral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na des de byed du gzhug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang du dal bus khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang / bcom ldan
80b5: 'das kyis de la chab sgo dbye ba mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' cig tu 'dug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni dge slong glo bur du 'das pa la dge slong khyod da lta ga las
80b6: 'ongs/ gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs shes bya ba'i so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la nye sde khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs/ gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs shes so sor
80b7: kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sas gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag da ltar ljongs nas mchis so// bdag ljongs su dbang gnas par mchid kyis 'tshal to// nye sde ljongs su dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas sam/ btsun pa bgyis so// nye gang
80b8: gis khyed mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyun gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/ btsun pa 'di na gal te bdag gi g.yar sngar rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhig mchis na/ bdag de la 'di skad ces bzhin bzangs khyod tshur ma chi/ dkon papa tshol cig

81a6: bzhinano/ / gang la la sbyangs pa'i yon tan dgagi bsngags brjod pa byed paden de'i bsngags brjod pa byed pa yin no// de cing byed ni// ngas sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag tsun ring po nas baspyod pa dang / bzung dang / bdugs pa dang /

81a8: po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/ nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyigaso skyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshem gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang 'ong ngas mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan

81b1: dag byar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang / 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa'i tshem gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/ dbyar gyinang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa cig dang /
81b2: da kyin po sbyong baN+Da lnga pa'i chom rtogs par bag cug las gang sam ldan 'das la wAr 'gro ba de bdag cagagis gung byed kyi lung babyed du gtsug gi zhes thams su byab bcas so// btsun pa padagan sa zung du mchis pa lags te/ don den /
81b3: slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi ba lags so// nye sde dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pas kyang dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba bsrung bar bya ba kho na yin no// nye sde 'di ltar ngas dge slong glo bur du lhags pa rnams
81b4: kyi kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas dge slong dag la gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yod ces bri bar bya'o// gal te 'drin de ltan legs/ gal te mi 'drin 'gal tshabs can du
81b5: 'gyur ro/ / nye sde de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do// dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang / rnyed pas chog pa'i
