117a7: ni bdag nyid kyis sam/ gzhan byed du 'dzud na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas lhung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la skur bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ chun po dang / bda' ba dang /
117a8: bang po las te/ dge slong gi lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dag gi chun po byed par byed/ 'jig par byed/ rmel bar byed cing ji srid pa stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis lug bal nag pa

117b1: 'ba' shig dag gi 'da' ba 'byed par byed/ 'jig par byed/ rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis lug pal nag po 'ba' shig dag gi dbang po 'byed par byed/
117b2: 'jig par byed/ rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' shig dag gi chun po dang 'da' ba dang / chun po dang phung po dang / 'da' ba dang / chun po
117b3: dang / 'da' ba dang phung po dang / phung po dang chen po dang / phung po dang 'da' ba dang / chun po dang 'da' ba dang / phung po 'byed par byed/ 'jig par byed/ rmel bar byed cing ji srid ru stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ snyan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed
117b4: du 'gyur ro/ / byas zin pa rnyed pa dang / byas zin pa la yongs su longs spyod pa dang / rnyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa la ltung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltud pa med do// bal nag po 'ba'
117b5: shig gi spang ba ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' shig gi stan sar
117b6: ba mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de dag bal dkar po dang / mkho ba pal cang zhig bcug nas lug gi bal nag po 'ba' shig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang / byed du 'dzud de/ des kyang de dag bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bar gyur cing / lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang /
117b7: khaton dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyig gnas kyang gtong bar byed do// de 'dod pa dang / de'i don nyid du 'ongs pa dag zam ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed nas/ dge slong don kyad du bci'i phyir dge slong dag
117b8: bal dkar po dang / mkhob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug gi pal nag po 'ba' shig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang / byed du 'jud de/ des kyang bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bar gyur cing / lung mnod pa dang klag pa dang // ba ton dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya

118a1: ba dag nang gi sems kyi gi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/ de 'dod pa dang / de'i don nyid du 'ongs pa dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed ces skrod par byed byar ka gtong bar byed/ khazer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong
118a2: ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du
118a3: med par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis lug gi bal nag po 'ba' shig gi san sar pa mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas bal dkar po dang / sa
118a4: bal cung zhig bcug nas lug gi bal nag po 'ba' shig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang / byed du 'jud pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang / chog mi shes pa dang / gso dka' ba dang / dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do//
118a5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / phra ba dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / mdzes pa dang / drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
118a6: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya
118a7: ste/ dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' shig las gzhug par bya/ gsum pa ni dkar po las/ bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las gzhug par bya'o// gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lag bal nag po 'ba' shig las ma gtsug gam/
118a8: gsum pa ni dkar po las/ bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las ma gtsug pad stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i lung byed do// dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so// tan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/ nang tshangs can dang / rnying sa pa ste/ don 'dir ni rnyings ma yin par

118b1: dgongs so/ / sar pa zhes bya ba ni sa rapa gnyis ste/ gsar pas sar pa dang / rnyed pas sar pa ste/ don 'dir ni gsang bas sar pa yin par dgongs so// byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan byed du 'jud na'o// cha gnyis ni lug bal nag pa
118b2: 'ba' shig las gzhug par bya zhes bya ba la/ lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug bal lo// nag po 'ba' shig ces bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste/ rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang / sngobs gnag pa dang / 'dam kha ba dang / kham pa'o// gsum pa ni dkar po las shes bya
118b3: ba las dkar po zhes bya ba ni gle'i bal dang / rgyab kyi bal dang / gnya' ba'i bal lo// bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las gzhug par bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ mkhob bal zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i bal dang / mgo'i bal dang / lho'i bal lo// ma bcug ces bya ba ni ma
118b4: bkres par ro/ / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis stan srad bcu pa byed na des lug bal/
118b5: nag po 'ba' shig las srad lnga dang / dkar po las srang byed dang gsum dang / mkhob bal las srang phyed dang gsum gzhug par bya'o// gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' shig las ma bcug gam/ gsum pa dkar po las/
118b6: bzhi pa mkhob bal las ma gtsug par stan sar pa byed na stan zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// srang bcu pa ji lta ba de bzhin du dge slong gis stan srang nyi shu pa dang / srad sum cu pa dang / srad bzhi cu pa dang / srang lnga bcu pa byed na des lug
118b7: bal nag po 'bab shig las srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / dkar po las srang phyed dang bcu gsum dang / mtho ba bal las srang byed dang / bcu gsum gzhug par bya'o// gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug pa la nag po 'ba' shig las ma bcug gam/
118b8: gsum pa dkar po las/ bzhi pa mkhob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na stan zin na spang ba'i ltung dbyed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dkar po dang / mkhob bal las srang gcig gam/ srad phyed pri ste/ lug bal nag po 'ba' shig las

119a1: la/ san sar pa byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// nag po 'ba' shig med pa dang / rin mnyam pa dang / dkar po dang / mkhob bal dkon pa dang / rin che bar gyur na srung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems
119a2: 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pal lung ba med do// / cha gnyis bsras pa'i spang ba ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ba na
119a3: bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la stan mad pa nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/ de dag stan 'di ni ha cang rings so// 'di ni ha cang thungs so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'drad do// stan 'di ni ha cang dog go/ 'di ni ba cang yangs so// 'di ni thams
119a4: gang sems cad du bugardoyo sha zad pa dang / bcos dka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pas dge slong de dag stan byas shing byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bar gyur cing / lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton dang / rnal
119a5: 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyi zhig nas gtong bar byed nas/ dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/ 'di dag stan 'di ni ha cang rings so// 'di ni ha cang thungs so zhes de bor
119a6: nas gzhan byed du 'dzad/ stan 'di ni ha cang dog go/ 'di ni ha cang yangs so// 'di ni thams cad du bug rdol dang / sha zad pa dang / bcos dka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pas dge slong 'di dag stan byas shing byas shing 'dor ba na
119a7: bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bar gyur cing / lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyi zhi ga nas gtong bar byed ces smod par byed/ kha zer bar byed/ kyar ka gtor bar byed pa'i skabs de dge
119a8: slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnams

119b1: ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/ khyed cag stan 'di ni ha cang
119b2: rings so/ / 'di ni ha cang thungs so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'dzad stan 'di ni ha cang dog go// 'di ni ha cang yangs so// 'di ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang / shazad pa dang / bcos dka' bar dganyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du
119b3: 'jud pa bden nam/ btsun pa mad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang / tsheg mi shes pa dang / gso dka' ba dang / dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dgagaso
119b4: sra ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / bri ba dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / mdzes pa dang / zod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos
119b5: rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / 'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o// gal te dge slong gis lo
119b6: drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung / ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na spang ba'i ltung byed de zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas na 'brog gi
119b7: nags na gzhugs so/ / brog gnas pang zhing drung che bas dge slong lag gi tha dag lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa de dag zang bdag gis las sar pa dag rdzun bcad par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du med par mdzad pa ste/
119b8: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/ mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/ dus su rmed pa/ rus la ma yol bar mi rmed pa/ don dang ldan par rmed pa/ don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa med pa la chu lon gyis klog pa mdzad pa yin

120a1: no/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan par rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong lag gi tha dag gi las mar pa dag tun
120a2: bcad par gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dge slong gis stan sang pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin dul drug tu bcang bar bya'o// gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du sun rnyed pa de spangs kyang rung / ma sungs kyang rung / snyan sar pa gzhan byeng na
120a3: spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas dge slong lag gi rme dag dpung lo drug gi bar du stan gyis mi thub pa de dag kyang ba dag gas las sar pa dang rdzun dkum par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
120a4: stsal ba/ kun dga' bo dge slong lag gi bla gang la lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa'i dge slong des dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol bar bya'o// 'di ltar gsol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ gaN DI brdungs te dris
120a5: p a'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong lag gi bla des spa gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims kyis phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar
120a6: nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las/ bdag dge slong lag gi tha ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dag 'dun las lo drug tshun chad durgyar
120a7: gnang ba gsol na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi tha ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal du gsol/ / de bzhin du la na gnyis lan gsum du bzlas te gsol bar bya'o//
120a8: dge slong de dag gis dge slong lag gi blad la dad pa'am/ yid ches pas 'gro bar mi bya bar dge 'dun thams cad der 'dod par bya ba'am/ dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag gtad par bya zhing de dag stan de rang gi mig sngar bab par bya ba'am/

120b1: yang na stan de dge 'dun gyi dbus su dbyung bar bya ste/ gal te stan de ha cang ring ba yin na de dag gis gcad par bya'o// gal te ha cang thung ba yin na bal sbyin par bya'o// gal ta ha cang yangs pa yin na de dag gis gcad par bya'o// gal te hacang ngag/
120b2: ba yin na pa la sbyin par bya'o// gal te ral pa dang rdul pa yin na pal sbyin par bya'o// la thams ca kyikyims cad bu rdzo dang / gzad pa dang / bcos dka' ba nyid yin na de'i lag tu dge slong cig gis gsol babya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun
120b3: rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong lag gi tha ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'odi lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las dge slong lag gi tha ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang bar gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
120b4: bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi tha mang 'di zhes bgyib la 'drug tshun chad du stan gnang bstsol to// 'di ni gsal ba'o// las na 'di kar bya ste/ dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gcan du gso/
120b5: dge srong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lo drug tu stan mo babyed pa las dge slong lag ga za ma 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad stan gnang bar gsol to// de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ngag slong lag gi tha med 'di zhes
120b6: bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang bstsal na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang mi gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shi ga/
120b7: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dag slong lag gi tha ming 'di zhes brgyab la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas da de bzhin du 'dzin to// dag 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi thag
120b8: la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba byin pa des lo drug tshun chad du stan byed du gzhug ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa

121a1: brjod de/ dge slong rnams la yang de dang 'thun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la
121a2: 'di ni gnang ba yin no/ / nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o// gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnyid pa de
121a3: spangs kyang rung ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/ / dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so// stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/ nang tshangs can dang / blings pa ste/
121a4: don 'dir ni rlings pa yin par dgongs so// sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/ gsar pas sar pa dang / rnyed pas sar pa ste/ don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so// byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/ gzhan
121a5: byed du 'jud na'o/ / mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ni lo drug gi mtha' tshun chad du bcad par bya ba'o// gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni de'i mtha' tshun chad du'o// stan rnying pa de zhes bya ba ni stan gang yod
121a6: pa de'o/ / spangs kyang rung ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung
121a7: byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ das na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ bar sdom la/ gnyis brtsams phyi ma zin pa dang / gnyis brtsams snga ma zin pa dang / gnyig zin nas gcig spong dang / gnyi
121a8: ga brtsams te gtong ba dang / / lo drug pa la nyes med pa/ de ni stan gyi bsdu ba yin// dge slong gis lo gang la stan rtsom par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa rtsom par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ byas zan na yang nyes byas

121b1: bu 'gyur ro/ / ma la ni lung ba med do// ma da nyid la san gnyis pa ma rtsom yang la gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lo lnga pa la sa na gnyis pa rtsam par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur ba/ byas cing na yang nyes
121b2: byas su 'gyur ro/ / snga ma la ni ltung ba med do// dge slong gis lo gang la stan bcom par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas snga ma zin par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du
121b3: 'gyur ro/ / lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas zin par mi byed kyang gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas snga ma zin par byed na de rtsom pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ byas zin na spang ba'i ltung
121b4: byed du 'gyur ro/ / dge slong gis lo gang la stan byas pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa yang byas nas des snga ma shos bzhag ste phyi ma shos gtong bar byed dam/ phyi ma shos bzhag ste snga ma shos gtong bar byed na gnyis bcom pa de la nyes byas
121b5: su 'gyur la/ byas rten snang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// rdzam la ni ltung ba med do// ma de nyidi la ldan gnyis pa ma byas kyang mo gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa la stan gnyis pa byas nas des snga ma shos bzhag byem
121b6: shos gtong bar byed dam/ phyi ma shos bzhag ste snga ma shos gtong bar byed na gnyis pa mom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// snga ma la ni phreng ba med do// dge slong gis lo gang la stan rtsom pa'i lod nyid lardzun
121b7: gnyis pa nga gams named mayin par ga ba byed dag/ la gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / rdzab la la mas nas des zin pa gtong byed com pa byed pa khye byas snga grang sa sngam nga med/ des slong sa yo me
121b8: ti lastan gnyes pami byed cing la gnyis pa la yang mi byed/ gsum pa la yang mi byed/ paning la yang mi byed lnga pa la yang mi byed par po drug pa 'byed na du med/ ma dang po pa dang spyo pa dang / ma 'jug pa dang tshong dag ni nyen gyung ba med de/ drog tu bcad pa'i thabs ste su can pa rdzogs s+ho//

122a1: 'dul ba rnam par byed pa/ bam po sum nu rtsa gnyis pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal bdon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs so// gang gi cha bcom ldan 'das kyis pa na med
122a2: pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa de'i tshan thams cad du yul gus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhas grag go zhes sgra grags so/ / byang la man cheng bdag gis yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste// gang dag de la mchod padag byed pa de dag gi mchod/
122a3: babyas pa de dag ni shin du 'bras bu che ba dang / khan pon che ba dang / gsalab che ba dang te chen por 'gyur ro zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zod dag thogs te mnyan yod du 'dong zhing der bdag cag gis kha spogs kyang bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan/
122a4: 'das la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du rig nas tshang ba lnga brgya byang lam nas zong dag thogs te yul dbus su 'phags so// de dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas de dag gis zod me khos su phab ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ga la ba der dong
122a5: na phyin pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod do// shes ldan dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
122a6: blta bar bya ba rin po che kho na yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar bltams pa dang / 'byung ba dkon pa yin no// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tsheng
122a7: bsdu brgya pa de dag khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das tshang ba de dag la tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag
122a8: bar ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/ yang dag par gzed bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzer

122b1: bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas tshang ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bsnyen bkur byas nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi gtsug lag khang blta bar brtsams pa dang / tshong ba de dag gis dge slong gnas/
122b2: brtan gnas btan rnams kyi mal dag na gding ba dbus rdal ba dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag ci'i phyir dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan 'di dag gi gding bdag dbus rdal bar
122b3: grung / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni bal cher mtshan mo dkyil mo dkrung gis 'da' bar byed do// de dag sems mngon par dad par gyur nas dad pa skyes pa de dag gis dge slong rnams la ras yug chen lnga brgya yulalo//
122b4: dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang bla ga ba med pa zhig tu bzhag go/ de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni
122b5: zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub pa mdzad de/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag
122b6: 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang / 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o// don 'di rin bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog
122b7: par bzhad pa dang / 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon pa / ba pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun sa nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chu
122b8: nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga'i rab nas kun dga'i ra bar/ gtsug lag khang de nas gtsug lag khang du/ khang khyim nas khang khyim du/ 'chags nas 'chags dang gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der

123a1: gshegs so/ / de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang ral pas rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dgasal bkram zhing 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang / ral pas rdul gyi phye ma dang
123a2: 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug pa dag gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang e ma zhes gsung zhing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag dag pa cing ci sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag byed
123a3: pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang / so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnyid pa de dag legs par brdul cing sprugs nas bting zhing bskams te rtsig pa la mi reg par mdzad nas
123a4: gtsug lag khang gi slad rol tu zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/ / de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
123a5: sa sa nyid kyis bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la
123a6: dge slong ji ltar zas bsod dam/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang / des gsol pa/ btsun pa te bor zas bsod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par bgyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad
123a7: nas gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams
123a8: pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di na ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po malon par shes nas lde mig khyer te thanada' ban kun da bdag ga 'ang nas gtsug lag khang du

123b1: khang khyim nas khang khyim du/ 'chags nas 'chag sar dang gol bar song zhing mthar gyis 'gro ba na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig gal ba der phyin nas ngas khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang
123b2: ral pas rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dgas la bkram zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang e ma zhes byas te smad nas 'di snyam du bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag dgabacir cing
123b3: sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod migs pa dang / so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs kyis/ dge slong dag byed kyis dad pas sbyin par bya ba la drod ngan par yongs su longs
123b4: spyad pa dang / spangs zhing yongs su longs spyad pa dang / dus su yongs su longs spyad pa dang / brtag cing yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khad kyis yongs su longs spyad na legs so// bar sdom la drodaran pa dang spang ba dang // de bzhin dus dang brtag
123b5: pa dang / / khad kyis yongs su spyad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod ran pa dang / spang ba dang / dus dang / brtag pa dang / khad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas
123b6: naphan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/
123b7: dge/ srong gis gding bsar pa byed na sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas klan par bya'o// gal te dge slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gnas
123b8: pa'i mtho gang 'khor bsam klan par gding ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ / dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so// gding ba zhes bya ba ni so sor gding ba'o// sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/ gsar pas sar pa dang / rnyed pas sar pa

124a1: don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/ / byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/ gzhan byed du 'jug na'o// sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sar pa sra bar bya ba'i phyir ro// gding ba rnying pa bde
124a2: bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te de la gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba gzhan yod na'o/ / bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i bu'i
124a3: khri phyed dang yod do/ / 'khor bas shes bya ba ni kun nas mtho yod pas so// man par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byur bar bya ba'o// ma glan par zhes bya ba ni sa sbyar bar ro// spang pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas sung byed kyi thung ba ba shags pa rgyab // des na spang
124a4: ung byed nas gsungs so/ / de ung ba ji/ khrur shen/ dge slong gis gding da pa bde bar gshegs pa'i tho ga 'khor bas ma ldan par di tsam cung dadu gde bsang pa spyo bar byed na thams cad du sna 'i thung byed du 'gyung // da
124a5: rnying pa thams cad kyi thams cad tu gzad pa dngabu dom du gyur pa dang / bcos su mi rung ba yin na ltung ba med do// de tsam med na srung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med de//
124a6: mtho gang gi spyad bste bco lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dag 'a byung zed nag po can 'di dag ni
124a7: rkang pa spre'u zhig gis bskus te 'gron yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed/ 'od na yang ko zung du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa grub par byed cing skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro// yu bu cag ni khron pa'i dus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dod/ gang
124a8: nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / yid tu 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis u bu cag kyang 'dong ngo // gang du 'dod/ gang du don 'thun 'grub par ro// de dag gis bsams pa/ gal te thams cad dong par 'gyur na bdag cag gi

124b1: nye bar spyod pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag kyang lhung bzed nag po can dag gis rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyis bdag cag gis gcig bzhag ste 'dod par bya na su bzhag par bya/ btsun pa 'char ka'o// btsun pa 'char ka khyod
124b2: 'di nyid du 'drag shig/ kho bo cag 'dod par bya'o// de bzhin gyis shig ces 'char ka de nyid du 'dug go/ lnga po dag gis don 'thun btsal bar brtsams pa dang / de dgags bal yul du 'gro ba'i don 'thun mthong nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bzhin
124b3: bzangs dag khyed gang du 'phags/ 'phags pa dag bal yul du'o// bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag kyang khyed dang lhan cig 'dong ngo // 'phags pa dag ngal yul ni rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba lags pas khyed cag der dgyes par mi 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs pa//
124b4: gal te de lta bu yin du zin kyang yul mthong bar 'gyur bas 'dod par bya'o// 'phags pa dag gal te de stan tshur skyon bzhud do// drug sde dag don 'thun de dag dang lhan cig bal yul du 'phags nas mthar gyis bal yul du phyin pa dang / nyi ma gang
124b5: nal ba la yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas de dag nang bar sngar langs te lam srang du dod pa dang / tshong ba dag gis drug sde dag mthong nas de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ngal yul ci 'dra/ khyed /
124b6: mngon par mi gyes par ma myur tam/ bzhin bzangs gnyis gang kho na la ba la yul du phyin pa'i nyis de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to// 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed la dang po la ni nam pal yul ni mo'i rgya 'dra ba lags pas/
124b7: cag ded dgyes par mi 'gyur rizhes ma bgyis sam/ bzhin zangs dag cing lhun 'gro'am 'dong ngo // 'phags pa dag pa gcag gis thongs pasgyur ted/ lags mdaH/ 'on kyang ga bdag cag dang shes thang ba gzhan dag pa sa bded/
124b8: gis zong bsgyur bas de dag la gtang bar bgyis de dag dang thabs gcig bzhud cig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ de mnongs kyis de bzhin pagyi'o// ba la yul na bal dang ldong ngos gnyis mod pas don 'thun de dag gis phal gyis shing rta bka d+ha sa

125a1: dang drug sde dag kyang don 'thun de dang lhan cig 'phags so/ / drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni rdul gyis 'jigs pas yang na ni don 'thun gyis mdun du 'gro// yang na ni byi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bas de dag don 'thun gyi bya bzhin 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
125a2: ji tsam na tshong pa de dag gi shing rta'i srog shing chag nas tshong pa de dag gis bsams gagal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na sgras chom rkun pa dag 'od bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis dang por bdag cag bsad par 'gyur la de'i 'og tu nor yang phrogs par 'gyur gyis bdag cag gis bshes bdag byer te 'dod
125a3: ngo snyam nag/ yid mi dag la zhing 'bor ba dang / ga sdedag lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir yid mi dga' zhing 'khod/ 'phags pa dang shing rta srog shing chag ste gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na sras chom rkun pa dag mchi bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis dang
125a4: por bdag cag bkum par 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu nor yang phrogs par 'gyur bas bdag cag gis gces pa dga' tshal te mchi'o snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing mchis so// bzhin bzangs dag khyed kyis bal dag yongs su btang dam/ yongs su btang ngo // gal te byed
125a5: cag la mi gnod na zhab dang / lham sgrog gu can dang / sto dkor nang tshangs can dang / rgya cang dang / lug pod dang / shur bu phre'u la sogs pa'i don du cung zhig bkur ro// 'phags pa dag bdag cag la 'dis ci bgyi/ thams cad sdoms shig/ drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bonya
125a6: dga' phyag dar khrod pa rnyed do zhes de dag gis lnga car gyi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag gcig gis bskur nas mi bzhis de nyid las thag pa bkal te khur po che bzhi drags nas de dag gis de khur te dong ngo / / de dag gis khur de dag khyer te 'phags pa dang / tshong pa de dag gis
125a7: drug sde dag bal gyi khur bslang ste phyi bzhin 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis gra mi dag khrid da mchi'o snyam du bsams nas/ khyed cag gis bal 'di thams cad bsnams te byon kyis 'phags pa dag la gla gsol lo// bkren pa dag kho bo cag
125a8: khyod kyi gla mi dag yin nam/ 'phags pa dag med kyang bzhad ga bgyi'o// don 'thun de'i nang na mu stegs can dag cig 'dod pa de dag gis smras pa/ kye ma drug sde dag khyed cag gang du khur 'jig par 'gyur/ gang du rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur/ khyod kyi ma'i lto dral

125b1: te der khur 'jig par 'gyur zhing der rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' ba nye dga' gal te don 'thun dang lhan cig 'dod na tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis don 'thun gyi mdun du 'dong ngo zhes de dag don 'thun gyi mdun du 'phags te dong ba dang / ri brags
125b2: shig na chom rgan pag na ci'i phyir yang rgod kyi mi mang po bkod cing 'khod pa de dag gis de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang nyam bar gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag zung ngo zhes ri brags pa de dag thams cad
125b3: skrag nas nags khrod dbyer ro/ / de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag ma yin gyi 'di ltar rnga modagacig 'ong ba yin no// kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni rnga mo ma yin gyi 'di ltar glang dag cig yin no// kha cig gis smras pa/
125b4: 'di dag ni glad ma yin gyi 'di dag ni khur thogs dag cig yin no// de dag thag nye bar gyur pa dang yang rgod de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag 'di lta bu'i khur dag thogs pas de'i phyir ri brags pa thams cad skrag ste nags khrod du byer ro// bkren pa dag gal
125b5: te chom rkun pa dag gis khyed cag de dag phred ngas par shes par srugyung na nyin mo'i nya me khon la yang bcings te nags khrod mid par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bo nye dga' gal te lam du 'dong na tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis lam gol bar 'dong ngo zhes de dag la ma gol bar zhugs te da
125b6: dang / sho gam bdag gis tshong pasho gam 'dral ba bsgugs pa'i phyir 'ge gru ba'i mi mang po dag bkod cing 'khod pa de dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/ a ma'o tshang pa sho gam 'dral ba dag ci'i phyir sho ga ma dral te 'dod/ bkren pa dag kho bo cag khyed kyi tshong bsho gam/
125b7: 'dral bdag yin nam/ khyed cag su yin/ 'phags pa drug sde dag yin no// bzhud cig de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' gal te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas zhugs na lhung bzed nag po can dag las tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis spre'u rung nas 'jug par bya'o
125b8: zhes de dag sre'u chung nas zhugs pa dang / rgan zhugs shig gis mthong nas des smras pa/ e ma'o khur tsa de dag ci'i phyir gong dral te 'jug par byed/ rgan zhugs kho bo cag khyod kyi khur tsa bdag yin nam/ des smras pa/ khyed su yin/ tshe dang ldan pa drug sde dag

126a1: yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag byon pa legs so byon pa legs so// de dag nang du zhugs nas de dag gis bal gyi khur de dag bshig pa dang / ri rab kyi rnam par 'dra ba'i phung po chen por rnam par gnas so// de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
126a2: dag khyed cag khur 'di lta bu dag thogs nas khyed la tho 'tsham bdag mi 'byung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo cag gis bza' ba kho na'i byer ba mngon par bsgrubs sam/ gang kho bo cag la tho 'tsham par byed pa de la kho bo cag gis kyang nyes zur sbyin par bya'o//
126a3: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed/ phyang ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom
126a4: ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du med par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no//
126a5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/
126a6: tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs dums rnam par smad pa mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par
126a7: gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan pas rnams kyi bslab ba'i gni bca' bar byeste zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngam bzhin no/ / pa nyen thos rnams kyis 'dul ba sa slab pa'i gzha'adi ltar gdon par bye// dge slong lam du zhugs pas lugasas dag rnyed la 'dod na /
126a8: slong des blang bar bya'o// blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o// de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed do// dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// lam du zhugs

126b1: pas zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pas so/ / lug pa la dag ces bya ba ni mug gibs dag go// rnyed la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so// 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gas te don du gnyer na'o// dge slong ngas blang bar bya'o nas bya ba ni mnod par byaba'o//
126b2: blangs nas byed pamed na nas bya ban dung byed pa med na// dag chad/ bram gyim pa'i bar gas bya ba da gci gsum kyi pang zun pa'i ba tshun chad nga// ra kyis pa ba bya nas rgya ni gang shes babang ba bya'o// dems 'as pa
126b3: khye na nas bya ba ni de las thal bar byer na'o/ / spang ba'i bur byed de gas bya ba ni dem pa de spangs nas cung byed kyi srung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na kyang 'i srung byed gis gsungs so// de la lung ba myur 'byung zhen/ dge slong gas zug nga
126b4: rnye pa khyer ba med na pa dag nyid kyis dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha' las 'das par khyer na rgyang grags byed du byin na nyis byas su 'thung la/ rgyang grags kyi mthar byin na sang ba'i ltung byed su 'gyur ro// khyer ba yod bzhin du bdag nyid kyis kyang na rtsom pa'i sa
126b5: na ces rgyas su 'phru / rgya thags byengs byinan sa smra na byung/ rgyu thugs kyi mapar byed yang gyi'i chung byed pa'abyung ngo // dul zu chug la rnal thamag ga/ rngas zlasar+b+ba/ laT u ga zhan
126b6: rba drul drug la ljags rdul gcig go/ / sngags rdul drug la ribang gi dril gcig go// dbong rdul drug la sug dul gcigago// sug dul drugs mang dul gcigag// thang chul drugs nyinyid kyirdul gcig go// teng gyi rdul dz+ra
126b7: lagrom gcigs/ / som drug la shag gcig go// shig drug la nas gcig go// nas drug la song ga cigag/ song bzhi drug la lpag // khru byed dang bzhi la ma grod do// khru zhi la ga tsu/
126b8: gzhu lnga brgyal rgyang grags gcig go// rgyang grags brgyad la dpag cang gcig go// de sa dge slong dgon pa pa lam du grags pas lug pal dag rnyed la/ nga te da pa da nga grags kyis krod su dag slong da ninyi u sung grogs tu byung byed

127a1: grwa ma gan ba ma du ga gas byed bye / sa ng+yas ga/ d+hA byug pa nga myed dru nga // 38/ ga paca dang / thang ga na ngas can dang / rgyad dang ca yo ga grang
127a2: la sogs pa'i don du de tsam dag khyer ba la ni ltung ba med do/ / las dang po pa dang / spros pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// bab thogs pa'i spang ba ste bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho//
127a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' ba la bgo bar bya'o// cha dur bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis btsun pa 'char ka 'di nyid na 'dus
127a4: 'dug pa la ci'i phyir skal ba sbyin/ cha lngar bya'o// 'char kas thos nas des smras pa/ cha dang ldan pa dag byed kyis deng rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang byed kyi gyis shig/ kho bo 'di nyid na 'dug/ 'dug pas rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang kho bos nyid kyir bya'o// nye dgas
127a5: bsams pa/ 'di 'di na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa mang po grub gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag dus thams cad du drug sde yin na de ci'i phyir lnga sder 'gyur bar bya/ cha drug kho nar bya'o// su 'gong du gzhug/ btsun pa'achang ka ma dub pa
127a6: yin gyis de 'god du gzhug go/ / 'char kas drug tu byas te bdag nyid kyi skal ba rang gi gnas khang du bcug ste bzhag go// de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis rnyed pa gang grub pa de khyer shog bgo'o// 'char kas smras pa/ kho bas de'i bar du
127a7: kaNi gcig cam yang marnyed do/ / khyod kyis kho bo cag bkrus so// 'chang kas bsams pa/ bdag gis pa la nyung ngum zhig rnyed pa 'disu rmel dga'// gal te byim dag la bcol na ni de dag bslab pa yang dag par mablangs pa yin pas thams cad sul

127b1: 'gyur ro/ / gal te bcu gnyis sde dag la btsal na ni bcol ba'i rin du 'jog par 'gyur ro// chos byin la bcol yang chos byin ni mdo sde'i mtha' ba yin la/ 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' ba dang ldan pa yin pas mdo sde'i tshig dag sem pan dus 'gyangs par 'gyur ro//
127b2: gau ta mI skem mo la bcol ru ya dag ta mI ske ma mo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin la/ de'i 'khor yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ldan pas de 'di ni ltung ba yin no// 'di ni ltung ba ma yin no zhes sem pa na dus 'gyangs par 'gyur ro// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni spong ba
127b3: ma yin la/ / 'khor yang spod ba pa dang ldan pas de sems rtse gcig tu 'dog pa la bal rnam pa mi gnod kyis bdag gis de la bal mal du bcol lo snyam nas/ dadi skas sems shing 'dug pa na skye dbu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta mIs bcom ldan 'das gal ba der 'ongs
127b4: pa de tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po khon nas mthong nas smras pa/ go ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa bsgrub ste/ da yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsal pa de legs par gsungs pa
127b5: yin te/ da gzod kho na bdag kye ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam pa'i blo skyes na khyed kyang 'dir 'ongs so// bdag gis bal nyung zhig rnyed pa de khyed kyis rmel du chug ste byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
127b6: blag 'tshal te spang mchis nas dge slong ma gnyis gtang gis de gnyis la bsrung bar rtsol cig/ 'char gas pa la de dag gzang thag gis bas po gnye/ su das dug tu bcings te/ glegs kyi phag tu bzhag go// de nas steng bu'i bdag po chen po
127b7: glebacom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la phyag 'tshal te/ dbyung bang dusan nas des de gnang dag slong ma gnyis btang te/ 'phags pa 'chang ka'i gnang dod la bab de myur du stsol nas gyis shig ces bzlar// de gnyis dong the smras pa/ 'phags pas
127b8: ta mor mchid nas bal de bsrur dugasol zhes mchi'o/ / 'chang kas de gnyis la smras pa/ sgo/ glegs kyi phag nabs po gnyis 'dug pa de gnyis khyed la deng shig/ de gnyis gnas khang du zhugs te 'dogs par brtsams pa dang / bskul btsam du yang /

128a1: ma nus nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dir rang thag gi gor ma dag stsal tam/ gzhon nu ma gnyis ci khyed gnyis gzhon nu ma gta' gam pa yin nam zhes des the'u chung gis bteg ste gcig ni gcig gi mgor bskur/ gcig ni gcig
128a2: gi rked du bskur ro/ / de gnyis mgo chag la thug go// rked pa chag la thug go zhes zer zhing dbyar khang du dong nas khuras la bzhag ste khri stong du skyel cing 'dug go// dge slong ma rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa khyed gnyis gzhon num gta' gam pa yin nam/ de gnyi
128a3: kyis smras pa/ khyed cag las stobs dang ldan pa gang yin pa des rje 'di theg shig/ de dag gis deg dag par brtsams pa dang bskul pa tsam du yang ma nus nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ma gnyis ci 'dir rang thag gi rdo dag bcug gam zhes de dag gis bam po de/
128a4: gnyis bshig pa dang ji tsam na phung po chen por rnam par gnas par gyur to// dge slong ma rnams kyis rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka na re ba la nung zhig zer na gal te mang bar gyur na ji lta bur 'gyur/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI sa
128a5: smras pa/ nu mo dag mgo bregs shing mchan khud ral bu can dag yin na dgod du ci yod/ 'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas pal nyung zhig ces mchin gal te mang bar gyur na ji lta bur 'gyur/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goru ta mIs smras pa/ nu mo dag de dag
128a6: ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag yin pas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'dums pa ltung bas ltung bar byed do/ / nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gnyis ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/ khur ma blangs pa mi len pa gang yin pa dang / khur blangs
128a7: pa mthar phyin par byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pas/ 'di ni khur blangs pa yin pas mthar phyin par byi dgos kyis// khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam rmel par spro ba de tsam rme la la de'i gan du khyer te byin cig/ de dag yun ring du thogs pa dang 'char kas
128a8: bsams pa/ de dag gis gal te bca' ba'i rin du bzhag gor ma chag/ bdag gis ma legs pa zhig bya nye bdag gis bal de ni char pas 'jigs pas gang la khar bzhag pa dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam mo// dge slong ma gnyis kyis phal khal cig rmel te

128b1: khyed de 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char kabal dag 'tshal te mchis na gang du gzhag par bgyi/ 'char gas bsams pa/ dadung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/ gnas khang du chug ste zhog shig/ de gnyis kyis
128b2: bzhags song ba dang / gzhan dag gis kyang khyer te 'ongs so// ji tsam na thams cad kyis kyang khyer te 'ongs so// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
128b3: 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta mI'i lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/ dper na ba tse blag mkhan gyi lag pa skad dmadapa 'ad mar pa dang shin du dmar bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
128b4: go'u ta mI la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to/ / go ta mI ci'i phyir khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/ dper na ba co brag/ mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba star dmar ba dang shin tu dmar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bgyi ba gzhan lags na gzhan bgyid do/
128b5: ji ltar gyur 'phags pa 'char kas bdag bal rmel du stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug pal dag rmel du 'dzud dam/ btsun pa rmel du
128b6: stob to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdub mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya
128b7: ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la sbas pa 'char ka khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug pal dag rmed du 'jud pa bden nam btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong
128b8: gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang yun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/

129a1: dge song dgang skabs napan yon mang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdam bzhin no// nga nyin thos rnams kyis 'dul bab bsla pa'i gan du /
129a2: gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong mnye du ma yin papa lug la 'khrung badzud dam/ 'tshed tu 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzun spang ba'i ltung byed do// yang dge slong gang zhis bya ba ni chang ka' ma gnan yang delta bu gang yin pa'o// dge slong ma zhes byar/
129a3: nichos 'di ba'o// nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / thugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nyidu yin la/ de ban chad ni nyi du ma yin no// lug pa la zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo// 'khrur 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni than chur sdug pabye su tshung na'o/
129a4: du 'dzud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshen du nyug pa byed du 'dzud na'o// rmel du 'dzud na zhes bya ba ni tha na 'da' ba byed du 'dzud na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//
129a5: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug bal dag 'khrur 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'tshed tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// rmel du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du
129a6: 'gyur ro/ / 'thung 'dzud pa dang 'tshed tu 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/ 'tsheng du 'dzud pa dang 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzud pa dang 'khrung 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzud pa dang 'tshed du 'dzu ngam/ 'khrur dza
129a7: pa dang 'tshed tu 'dzud pa dang / rmel du 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis zabs lug bal dag 'khrur 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'tshed tu 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// rmel du
129a8: 'dzud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ / 'khrur 'dzud pa dang 'tshed tu 'dzud dam/ 'khrur 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzad dam/ 'tshed tu 'dzud pa dang 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed tu 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzud pa dang 'khrur 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzud pa

129b1: dang tsod tu'adzung pa/ 'byung 'dzung ba dang / 'tsho du 'dru ba dang / ches tubadzun spang ba'i mu byer 'gyur ro// dge slong gis ge slong ma dupa she du ma yin par shes pas mag ladag byang dza na zhes byasas 'gyur ro// cang nga dzun
129b2: nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ / rmel du 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'thung badzud pa dang 'chod du 'dzud dam/ 'khrung 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/ 'cha 'jung pa dang 'brur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed tung dzu pa dang rdal dra rdu ngam/ rme ladu lung pa dang cu
129b3: 'dzu ma/ rmel du dzung ba dang 'tshed du 'dzud ma/ 'byung 'dzud pa dag / 'tshed du 'dzung pa dang / rme la du 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong ma dul ya gnyis thabs lug pal dag 'khrung 'dzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'tshed
129b4: nas nyes bya su khru'o/ / rmel du 'jung na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'dzud dam/ 'khrur badzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang 'khrur 'dzud dam/ 'tshed du 'dzud pa dang rmel du 'dzud dam/
129b5: rmel du 'dzud pa dang 'tshod 'dzud dam/ rmel du 'dzud pa dang dz+ra dzu dam/ 'khrur badzud pa dang 'tshod tu 'dzud pa dang / rmel du badzud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// las dang po po dang / smyos pa dang / sems bkrugs pa dang /
129b6: tshocho bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med pa// pal chel du dzud pa'i srung bste bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// / sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po babar 'od ma'ang tshal kas na ka gnas
129b7: nagazhugs so/ / de nas grong dpon gtsugan nor bubacom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go// mtha gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la
129b8: grong dpon gtsug na nor bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyis tshes snga bzhig na rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang / blon po'i 'khor mchis shing 'thun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka mchid kun tu brjo ba

130a1: 'di lta ba 'di byung bar gyur te/ shes ldan dag cing gi slong rnams la mngon mtshan can drung dam// shAkya'i sras kyidage sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed dpa/ 'on te dege srang rnams la mngon mtshan na mi shing gAkya'i bras kyi /
130a2: sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid ces mchi nas/ de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung ning shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi/ kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can
130a3: mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchin/ btsun pa de la gang dag de skad ces dege/ slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gi bgyid de zhes mchi na/ btsun pa dI/
130a4: gang dag de skad mchi de da/ / de ltar yarda sprod par bgyid pa na bcom ldan 'das la skur ba 'debs par mi bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i
130a5: chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun pas spad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam/ grong dpon gang dag de sad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAH'i
130a6: sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na de la skur ba 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang / de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang chos smrab ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes 'thun pa'i chos na spyod/
130a7: par byed pa ma yin pa dang / smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin du 'ong ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras
130a8: dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gsar bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro// grong dpon ngas khyed la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum

130b1: gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gdal la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gsar bdag gi byed pa de ni dge sbyong ga chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkra'i sras te
130b2: chos ma yin no/ / btsun pa gang gi slad tu bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gdal la la mngon mtshan can ru zhing gser bdag gir bgyid
130b3: pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' stsal te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong dpon ngas khyod
130b4: la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid
130b5: pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' bstsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni cha cher bzang ba lags so/ / btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can ma
130b6: rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gsar bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gangal la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba khon lags so// grong dpon de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/
130b7: dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung ning gser ba dag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin ning de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no// de nas
130b8: grong dpon gtsug na nor bus bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de'i tshen tshe dang ldan

131a1: pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dpon gtsug na nor bu song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chung nas
131a2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dbong sa'i khang par sdus shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin
131a3: 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
131a4: zhabs la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong rnga snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa/
131a5: de dag thams cad dpong si'i khang par mchis shing 'thun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
131a6: gong dag dan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ci'i grong dpon gtsug na nor bu de ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te
131a7: mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ / mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ngal grong dpon gtsug na nor bu 'di skad ces btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyi tshes snga bzhig na rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang blon po'i 'khor mchis shing 'thun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi
131a8: bka' mchid kun tu rjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/ shes ldan dag ci dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung ngam/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/ 'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing

131b1: shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid ces mche nas/ de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi/ kha cig ni 'di skad
131b2: ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchin/ btsun pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams
131b3: gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi na/ btsun pa ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
131b4: gsungs pa'i rjes su smra dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang / gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam zhes zer nas/ ngas de
131b5: l a 'di skad ces grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na nga la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal
131b6: bar byed pa dang / de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos brda sprod par byed pa ma yin pa dang / smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang 'thun
131b7: pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong ba yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed de gang la las mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser
131b8: bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de na shAkya' sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / grong dpon ngas khyed la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya

132a1: sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gar mabyed de/ gang lal la mngon mtshan can drang shing gas bdagag byed pa de ni dani sbyong gachos ma yin ni de ni gakya' sras kyi chos ma yin no gas smras pa dang / de nga la 'dis ces btsun
132a2: pagang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhi kya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gis bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gangal la la mngon mtshan can rung shing gsar bdag gar bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong
132a3: chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' stsal te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong dpo nangs khyod la don
132a4: nyid kyi phyi la na gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan cadan rung zhing gser bdag gi bgyid
132a5: de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya tshor bzang ba lags so/ / btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan
132a6: can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang lal la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ga kho na lags so zhes zer ro// ngas de la 'di skad
132a7: ces grong dpon de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gsar bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos
132a8: ma yin zhing de ne shAkya'i sras kyi tshes ma yin no zhes smras so/ / de nas grong dpon gtsug ni nor bu des ngas smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba byas nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te nga'i drung nas song ngo //

132b1: de nga dag de ltar byed dpa nag tsug nan kyangs rgyal po dang bcas pa'i ma gyi mdun dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can sa ru shing sna mas kyi dag sbyong rnams gas padag ga ma byed de/ gangalal la mngonan na na/
132b2: rung shing gser bdag gir byed pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang gnon mi za bar rung ba yin no zhes chagacig bzung ste khyumachog gi tshig rgya chen po smos shing lakhod kyi nang du yang dag pa des dge'i sgra bsgrags so// da
132b3: dgangs kyang daskad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can 'i chi shing u0f7f'i mas kya ni skyong rnams gas bdag gar ma byed de/ / gangalal lamangonamatshan can du shrI gas ga gi byed pa de ni de slong gcos pa yi shen
132b4: drug kya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis daderang byin ci dag 'dod pa dag gis shing songs su btsal bar bya/ rtswa 'dod pa dag gis niH/ shing da las 'dod pa dgagos ni shing ta las/
132b5: sa 'ad padag gis ni mams yongs su ba gyi zhes grwa y-i ni ma nam thas sang gas kya gas / sa na// 'di gig zung ba yin kyis sa rgyas so sa das dpa gig zung mnyin
