153b8: g.yas 'byung / sbyar ba 'di nyid las so// khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/ 'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so// sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so//

154a1: ba su la thugs ngan mdzad// khyed cag la ste/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zher 'dir 'ongs la/ 'di nas bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do// 'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'dzag rten
154a2: pha rol tu mchi ba'i shul rgyags cung zad bkur ba'i thabs ci mchis/ sring mo dag gal te khyed kyis dge sbyong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ gis pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan
154a3: pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer por 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de lta bu ga las rnyed/ sring po dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las
154a4: rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam/ 'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis/ sring mo dag khyed kyis bsod nams
154a5: chung yang brnyas mi bya/ / de ni bdag la mi 'od min/ chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis// snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin// brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni// cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs// zhes bya ba de mi shes sam//
154a6: khyed kyis re shig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srar phyed dbul lo// gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo// de bzhin du thams cad
154a7: kyis kyang shas shes kyis dbul bar khas blangs so/ / nye dgas smras pa/ sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so// bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas/
154a8: ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo// sring mo dag de je bos shig/ de dag gis de bos pa dang / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo rje dog pa phra ra khol cig/ des phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig/ des de/

154b1: pas kyang phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go// nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis
154b2: dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo mi thog go// bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam tsi/ khyed cag gis 'di'i don du khel la 'di khyad cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig/ 'phags pa gal
154b3: btub na'o/ / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo byas shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra ba dar che ba lags pas yun ring mos bkal 'tshal gyis ha cang ngos drag tu ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye rags de/
154b4: la a rog khya zhes smras nas stan las la ngas te song ngo // bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo// nye dgas de dag la a rog khya sbyin pa 'dis khyed
154b5: sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smraspras te song ngo // de nas nya dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/ des dge
154b6: slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos// gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo // gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i thag pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci
154b7: khyed kyis te dgang zil rdzas gnon tam/ gal te nye dga'ang ba tum byung du zin na nye dga'ang nyid thag par 'gyur ro// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan gal zil gyis gnon/ 'di ltar rab gage mo'i dran zag pa skye ca khyog
154b8: mchis te/ gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed tu lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro// bu dag a rog khya don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes dos dag pa de khyer te thag pa da'i khyi ba dra song

155a1: pa dang / des thag pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/ gdas dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin// mi mkhas rab tu mi snang ba/ mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin/
155a2: bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos shig/ 'phags pa dag pa bzang ngo // dog pa ni 'di lags la thag pa ni bdag lags na
155a3: chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/ / bzhin bzangs thogs shig/ 'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/ bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid tu thags klas mi ngams sam/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i
155a4: lam rgyags kyang bkur bar gyis shig/ de la chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras 'dis thag ring po kho na nas bdag cag gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod kyis 'di'i res yug chen thogs shig/ 'phags pa dog pa 'di phra ba dar che ba lags
155a5: kyis yun 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye dgas a rog khya zhes smras te song ngo // thag pa des ras yug chen de dus de tsam gyis btags so// nye dgas yang dus de tsam gyis der song ba dang tha ga ba des de la ras yug chen de phul lo//
155a6: nye rags de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des dge slong rnams la ras yug chen de bstan te/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i ras yug chan ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan ras yug chen bzang ngo // 'di ltar gang
155a7: la 'di lta bu gnyis pa yang mchis pa de ni sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim du bgyis te dge ba'i phyogs la snying las chung ngus ton bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyod kyi snying lam na nye dgas ras yug chen 'di 'dra ba gnyis sbyor du 'jud
155a8: mi rus snyam 'am/ ji ltar sbyor du 'jud pa ltos shig/ de nas nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang tshes gos thogs te mnyan yod tu nub sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam

155b1: dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/ nyin mtshan du thong shol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la sgyud dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam
155b2: nas des de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag a rog khya a rog khya/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang po'i yid tu mi 'ong ba 'jig
155b3: rten thams cad dang thun mong pa 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro// de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan las langs te nye dga'i stan
155b4: bting ba dang nye dga' de la 'dug nas des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/ / nye dgas de dag la smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i tshes yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/ 'phags pa ci yang ma mchis
155b5: so/ / sring mo dag pa lags so// bu mo 'dis ni re shig dge ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/ 'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no// 'dis kho
155b6: bol mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/ / gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// sring mo dag
155b7: khyed cag gi 'tshe ches dag ga las 'brung 'phags pa skur ba 'di nyid las so/ / gos dag ga las 'byung / skur pa 'di nyid las so// khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/ 'phags pa de ni thams cad
155b8: kyi thams cad tu ma mchis so/ / sring mo dag ma lags so ma legs so// 'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/ khyed cag la ste/ khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la/ 'di nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pa

156a1: ngal du 'gro bar byed do/ / 'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du mchi tha'i shul rgyags cung zad bkur ba'i thabs ci mchis/ sring po dag gal te khyed kyis dge slong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung bsde sdod
156a2: gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa bdag cag gis/
156a3: dge slong de lta bu ga las rnyed/ sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung bsnga snod gsum dang ldan pa/ chos sgrog pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam/ 'phags pa bdag cag la ras @
156a4: chen gyi 'byor pa galas mchis/ sring mo dag khyed kyis bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/ de ni bdag la mi 'ong min/ chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/ snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni/ cung zad nung
156a5: zad bsags na rdzogs/ zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/ khyed kyis re shig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/ rngo thog go/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo// gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/ bdag gis kyang srang gi
156a6: bzhi cha cag dpal lo/ / de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas blangs so// nye dgas smras pa/ sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so// bdag cag gi
156a7: nang na ba ga nas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo/ / sring mo dag de rdzobos shig/ de dag gis de bos pa dang nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo dzi dog pa phrar khol cig/ des phrar bkal ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo de bas kyang brar khol cig / des da
156a8: kyang brar bkal ba dang / nye dgas yang dang yang dubu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go/ tedags de dag la spras pa/ srid mo dag byed cag thams cad kyis dog pa'ang

156b1: 'dra ba sha stag byen cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis dag pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo ma thog go/ bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam ci/ khyed cag gis 'di'i don du khol la/ 'di khyed cag gi den du 'khal du chug shig/ 'phags pa gal te
156b2: na'o/ / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra ba dang che ba lags pas yun ring mos bka' 'tshal gyis ha cang ngos drag par ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig/ nye dgas
156b3: de la a rog khya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo / / bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de bzhin dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo// nye dgas de dag la a rog khya/ sbyin pa
156b4: 'dis khyed sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo // de nas nye dgas dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag
156b5: khang du song nas des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa 'di ci 'dra ltos/ gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo // gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i thag pa 'ga' btsal ba
156b6: mchis sam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnon tam/ gal te nye dga' rab tu ma thung du/ nen nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan ga la zil gyis gnon//
156b7: 'di ltar rab ga go mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug mchis te/ gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed tu lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro// bu dag a rog khya don gyis na khyed kyis kho ba'i ras yug chen 'thag tu
156b8: bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang / des thag pa de thag ring po kha na nas mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/ gangs dang ldan pa 'o bo bzhin/ mi mkhas rab tu mi snang /

157a1: mun pa nang du mda' 'bangs bzhin/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// dog pa 'di ci 'dra rje ltos shig/ 'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo // dog
157a2: ni di lags la thag pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/ / bzhin bzangs 'di yang thogs shig/ 'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/ bzhin bzangs khyod rtag pa nyid tu thags glas
157a3: mi ngoms sam/ 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags kyang bkur bar gyis shig/ 'phags pa ras yug chen snga ma de 'thag pa na bdag gis bu len gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang da dung 'khor ro// des chung ma'i gdong du blta
157a4: bar brtsams pa dang / chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te 'di 'tshal yang bdag ni mi 'tshal lo// nye dgas spyos te smras pa/ kwa'i tha ga pa spyi cer nyon cig/ kho bos gal te khyod ras yug chen 'di 'thag
157a5: tu ma cug na spyi cer gyi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro/ / thag pa des kyang spyos te smras pa/ kwa'i dge sbyong mgo reg nyon cag/ kho bo gal te khyod kyi ras yug chen 'thag na mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro// nye dgas spos
157a6: te song nas kau sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis pho brang gi yid brten pa che ba zhes bya ba nye dga'i mdza' bo zhig yod de/ nye dga' de'i sdum par song ste/ g.yog 'khor dag la spras pa/ kye nang rje dag che ba gang song
157a7: de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa srad du mchis so// nye dgas de 'ong ba'i srang du song ba dang / che bachang 'tsheng ba'i tshong rdal zhig tu zhugs so// nye dga' tshong rdal de'i sgor bsdad de che ba la nye dga' sgo na sdong
157a8: kyis phyir byung shig ces prin spring pa dang / che ba byir byung nas smras pa/ btsun pa nya dga' phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// nye dgas smras pa/ che ba kho bas ko khyod rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag lan

157b1: brtson par gyur snyam du bsams kyis/ kho bos khyod 'di ltar chang 'tshong ba'i khyim nas chang 'tshong ba'i khyim du 'phyan par ni ma bsams so// 'phags pa bdag rgyal po'i dgos pas 'dir thugs so// btsud pa nye dag
157b2: bon pa'i dgos pa ci mchis/ che ba dog pa cung zhig rnyed pa 'dis re shig ras yug 'thag tu chug shig/ bdag gis btsun pa nye dga' la ras yug chen nyid dbul lo// de yang bkur na ci dad pas sbyin par bya ba 'di dor
157b3: bar bya 'am/ che bas mi zhig la bsgob/ kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna po'i gan du song la 'phags pa nye dga'i ras yug chen 'di thogs la phul cig ces gyis shig/ nye dgas smras pa/ 'di thag pa'i snga bo 'thag du ma gtsug
157b4: par 'di ltar rab ga ge mo zhig gi drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug 'dug pa des 'di btag par bya'o/ / che bas mi de la smras pa/ kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cer de'i gan du song la 'di skad ces che ba ni re 'di thogs la byin cig ces zer ro zhes
157b5: gyis shig/ mi des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song ste smras pa/ kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas 'di thogs la byin cig ces gsung ngo // spyi cer gyis dog pa de do shes nas des smras pa/ bdag gi res khor ro//
157b6: mi de song ste che ba la spras pa/ tha ga pa skye cer gyi mchid nas bdag gi res khor ro zhes mchi'o// che bas smras pa/ kye nang rje spyi cer gyi gan du song la 'di skad ces res gzhan byed tu mi gzhug go zhes gyis shig/ mi de song ste spras
157b7: kye sbyiHdu che ba'i shul nas ras gzhan byed tu mi gzhug go zhes gsung ngo / / spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kye nang rjerje ba mnyan yang nyung bang byed na kho bo mnyan yod tu mi gnas par zad med/ kha bskal pa ma yin pa'i las mi byed do//
157b8: mi de che bi'i gan du song ste smras pa/ spyi cer gyi mchid nas che ba mnyan yod tu dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod tu mi gnas par zad med/ kho bo skal pa ma yin pa'i las mi byed do zhes mchi'o// che bas smras pa/ kye nang rje thag pa'i

158a1: sna po'i gan du song la dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig ces gyis shig/ nye dgas smras pa/ 'di tha ga pa'i sna pos btag par mi bya bar 'di ltar tha ga pa spyi cher gyis btag par bya'o// che bas mi de la smras pa/ kye nang
158a2: rje thag pa spyi cher gyi gan du song la/ che ba na re skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig/ de 'phags pa dang / nye dgas de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod su zhig gis rgyal po'i mer bzhag/ khyod lcag rgod mar
158a3: pos brdabs te sa dang shing dag skyed tu gzhug par bya ba yin no/ / tha ga pa spyi cher gyi gan du song ste 'di skad ces che ba'i zhal nas ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo // zhes zer mi nus sam/ gal te mi 'thag go zhes zer na thor to dganas/
158a4: bzung ste khug la khu tshur gyis gtogs shig/ gal te dun thags mi mthun par dril cig/ gal te de'i chung ma dun lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar bya zhing / khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mchid bcag pas khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la
158a5: ka sha ba Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i khyod la basmin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ / de ltan kho bo 'angs yug chen yang 'grub par 'gyur la khyod kyis kyang gsug mang po 'thob par 'thur ngo ro// de song sa smras pa/ che ba'i nal nas so mthong sbyin gyis
158a6: ram rgyag chen thogs shig ces byung ngo / / phyi cir gyis smras pa/ kho bozhal ba ma yin pa rabag mi rnas so// ngas de'i thor brod gnas bzung ste bkug nas 'tshud kyis brtags so// des drabang brtsams pa dang / des de'i thags
158a7: mthun pa ci ba brnams so/ / de chungams nga byarnams pa dang / des do lan ldanas bzung ste nga ba brtsams shing byed gnyis kyis tsha ba'i mchid bcag pas byed gnyis gos yang byung 'i rgyal pogs la rnal la ka shA
158a8: lnga brgyag zhal dgos pa'i rtsod la basmin par byas chung sho/ / rgyal po'i pho zang du dang ngagis des dganyis khrid de 'phags pa dang chung mas sbyi la smras pa/ rje'i sras ga te bdag caganyis chen dang lug par byung na bdag cag gnyims

158b1: thar par byed pa 'ga' yang med pas btson rang gnod pa dag gis 'chi bar bya dgos kyis ras yug chen 'di thogs shig/ spyi cer gyis smras pa/ kye nang po bdag cag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma bkri bar dog pa zhog la bzhud cig dang bdag gis ras
158b2: yug chen yang btag cing khyod la yang gsug mang po dbul lo/ / des dog pa bzhag ste song ba dang / spyi cher gyis chung ma la spras pa/ bzang po ras yug chen/ 'di gang gis dog par yang ma rung la ngas yug chen du'ang mi drang ba 'gyung
158b3: bde ltar btag par bya'o/ / chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras de dge sbyong hral po de lta bu yin pas bdag cag gis ras yug chen de lta bur byas na des btang re swAn/ des ras yug chen de btags nas de ras yug chen de thags las 'grol zhing 'dug
158b4: pan nye dga' yang 'ongs nas nye dgas ras yug chen de blangs pa dang / spyi cer gyis spras pa/ 'phags pa bdag la sko mthong stsol cig/ bkren pa kho bo khyod kyi sgomathong dbul ba yin nam/ rug ci'i phyir me brgyad du ji ci'i phyir mi brgyad/ de shAkya
158b5: pa'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ / bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar kha'i chos chung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go// rgyal po'i pho brang gi mthu cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go zhes smod par byed/ phyang ka gtong bar byed/
158b6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//
158b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la smras pa/ nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa
158b8: bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa/ de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa

159a1: mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs dums rnam par spang nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i
159a2: gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas thag pa nye du ma yin pa las gos 'thag
159a3: tu'ajud na gos grub na spang ba'i lung byed do/ / yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'a'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas shes bya ba ni 'dun bsal la las srang gcig/ la la las srang byed/
159a4: la la las zho gnyis/ la la las zhogacig bslangs pa'i dog pas so// tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no// nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni
159a5: nye du ma yin no/ / gos 'thag tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdun po pal gos dang / sha na'i gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos las/ gang yang rung ba'o// gos grub na zhes bya
159a6: ba ni gos thob na'o/ / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi srung ba bshags pa bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la lung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa
159a7: bslangs te thag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ za ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te thag pa nye du la
159a8: gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/ de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/

159b1: bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de spong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ tha ga pa nye dul 'thag tu 'jud pa la
159b2: srung ba med do/ / tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i srung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang thag pa nye du ma yin pa gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su
159b3: 'thur la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// zag pa nye du ma yin pa la 'bag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye dul
159b4: gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// zag pa nye dul 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do// dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te zag pa nye du ma yin pa lags/
159b5: 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la srung ba med la/ zag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i drung byed cu 'gyur ro// ge slong gis nye du las dag pa bslangs te thag pa nye dul gos 'thag tu 'jud na de spong ba la srung ba med la/ thag pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud
159b6: ba la yang ltung ba med do/ / dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na de spong ba la srung ba med la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te thag pa nye du ma yin pa
159b7: la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/ zag pa nye dul gos 'thag tu 'dzud pa la yang ltung ba med do// zag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis nye du las dog
159b8: pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang bag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na/ de slong ba la lung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid su 'gyur ro// zag pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang la byed /

160a1: dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong pa la ltung ba med la/ bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur ro// zag pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa
160a2: la ltung ba med do/ / gla rngan gyis 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do// 'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho//
160a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed
160a4: dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ / khyim bdag de dus gzhan zhig na gzhan gyi chung mal chags par gyur nas de la chung mas rje'i sras de lta ma mdzad cig ces phyir bzlog na/ ji tsam du de'i phyir bzlog kyang ma log pa de tsam du de'i
160a5: chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig/ 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do// khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/ chung ma de yang skyes pa// gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas da ltar khyim de gnyi ga rgud par gyur
160a6: nas de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so zhes/ khu tshur dang / thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do// bu mo des smras pa/ bdag gis khyim rgud par 'gyur pa 'di ci
160a7: phas gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bzhir rung / nye dgas tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag gi/ chung ma de'i gan du song ste/ ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su
160a8: 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gan dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas de de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gan

160b1: dgas gnas par byas pa/ / khyim bdag de gtum pa/ bdun ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu ma de la brdegs par brtsams pa dang / chung mas de la smras pa/ rje'i sras gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pam
160b2: mthun pa de'i cho ga rdeg par mdzad mod/ de bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa ma khyen pas 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags
160b3: pas su zhig su'i bran lags/ bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig/ bzang mo khyod zer ba mnyes so// bum tshur shog/ khrus kyis la shog shig/ bu mo de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang / des de la gos phrugs cig bskon nas smras pa
160b4: bu mo dga' zhing las byos shig/ bu mo des bsams pa/ khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/ btsun ngas pa/ drag shul che ba yin te/ yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang thal lug dag gis rdeg par byed cing zas dang gos ngan
160b5: pa dag sbyin par byed na/ da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam nas/ yang bsams pa/ gang tshun cad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas
160b6: bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya snyam nas des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di las chung zhig brkus te dbul du ni khyi ma bdag 'dis bdag brdeg btsag mang po byas te sngon gyi gan su bzhag par
160b7: 'gyur ro/ / snyam nas de sdod cing 'dug go// khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lags pa nye dga' ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ 'phags pa nye dgas bdag
160b8: cag las dri ma can dang bral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/ yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis sdud par byed pas bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// bzang mo de

161a1: bzhin bya'o/ / rje'i sras bdag gis dog pa 'jam po bkal te/ dog pa de las thag pa che ge mo zhig las ras yug chen 'thag tu stsal cing skad kyis ras yug chen skon par bgyi'o// khyim bdag des dog pa de thag pa la byin nas smras pa/
161a2: bzhin bzangs khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig dang 'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar bya'o de ltar bya'o// bu mo des de thos nas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o snyam mo// nye dga'//
161a3: yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang / bu mo des khyim legs par blugs shing phyag dang bor nas/ des
161a4: dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa bran par bgyi'o// nye dgas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sbran par bya/ khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug
161a5: chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ / nye dgas bsams pa/ sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par dang bu mos 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo ci kho bo//
161a6: la tho 'tsham par byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ bdag ci'i slad du 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid/ nye dag sa smras pa/ bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la tshugs ma bya'o// ji ste brdzun par gyur na ni brdeg
161a7: btsog mang po byed tu bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/ / 'phags pa gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogs ga ga mo zhig na tha ga pa mchis pa der bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro// de der song ste tha ga
161a8: bapal smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ras yug chen po 'thag pa 'di su'i yin/ 'phags pa btsun pa nye dga'i lags so// khyod kyis nye dga' shes sam/ ma 'tshal to// de ni kho bo yin no// bzhin bzangs srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings shig/ 'phags/

161b1: bdog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur// khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro// kho bos kyang khyod la cung zhig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// nye dga' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs gos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod
161b2: snyoms la zhugs nas de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim du zhugs nas/ des de'i stan bting ba dang / de de la 'dug nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du
161b3: 'dug go/ / des del chos bstan nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci lags/ deng spyan drangs sam/ bsod snyoms mdzad/ bsod snyoms bgyid do// des bsams pa su zhig bdag pas bsod snyoms ches bzang ba 'bul bar 'gyur snyam nas des
161b4: de la hwags kyi la thu dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ / nye dgas de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i gan du song nas des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dza lag pa gnyis bzed cig/ des lag pa gnyis bzed pa dang / des de la la thu cig byin nas
161b5: smras pa/ bzhin bzangs rnga tho shig/ des de zos pa dang / des de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs la thu'i ro ci 'dra/ 'phags pa bda'// khyod kyis sngon lan 'gar lathu 'di 'dra bzos sam/ 'phags pa lan 'gal
161b6: yang ma 'tshal to/ / thu bzed cig/ des thul bzed pa dang / des de'i thu bar la thu thams cad blugs te smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thogs shig/ kho bos khyod la phyis kyang la tha nang za nye bar bsgrub par byas
161b7: shing du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig/ 'phags pa dog pa bas par gyur na sus stsol bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro// des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na dag bzad nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ji tsam na/
161b8: khyim bad ge chung ma ni med/ khyim bdag ni 'dug nas thag pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ khyim bdag ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pazad kyis dog pa byin cig/ khyim bdag des byin te bta dang / yang 'thag pa na

162a1: dog pazad nas de yang khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang / ri tsam na khyim bdag ni med khyim bdag gi chung ma ni 'dug nas thag pa des khyim bdag gi mung ma de la smras pa/ srungs yug chen de btag pa'i dog bzad kyi dag pa byin cig/ des byin
162a2: tebatang ngo / / yang 'thag pa na zad nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ci tsam na khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi ga 'dug nas thag pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/ khyim bdag yang ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis//
162a3: yang dog pa byin cig/ khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ kye thag pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ khyim bdag gis chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo ci khyod kyis kyang 'di la dog pa byin nam stsal to// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ kye tha ga pa
162a4: ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/ tha ga pas smras pa/ khyim bdag ci der bskyed par brtsams pa snyam 'am/ nyi ma gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas 'di skad ces srid tu 'di tsam gyis srings shig/ zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyesnyed cig ces
162a5: mchi ba'i nyi ma de kho na la bskyed par brtsams so/ / khyim bdag gi chung mas bsams pa/ ras yug chen de ci 'dra de ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ba dang / di tsam na chen po de la 'os pa'i ras yug chen mthong ngo // de mthong nas de'i mig
162a6: khrag gis gang ste smras pa/ kho mos ras yug chen 'di 'phags pa nye dga' ba'i byin no// kho mos de'i don tu ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'thag tu gzhug go zhes zer te song ngo // nye dga' dus dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/ kye tha ga pa
162a7: rung ngam/ 'phags pa bdag ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo // kye thag pa ji ltar gyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gi chung ma mchis par gyur te des ras yug chen mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang b+he/ kho mos 'phags pa nye dga'
162a8: la ras yug chen 'di mi sbyin no/ / kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan 'thag tu gzhug go zhes mchi ste mchis so// kye thag pa khyod la kho bos chung zhig byas pa yod pa shes sam/ des smras pa ci'i slad du ma 'tshal ba dag da dung yang

162b1: kyis zu/ la sa// thabs pa gang namam sa rgyas dang sa pa byung pad na cad kyis pa gcan di ma shan na/ 'phags pa dag dang dgags kyang pa ba pa / tad
162b2: khyim du ma sten ba gar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag gi rlung mdas rkang pa la phyag cas te bsong sna ning mdanas chog go// thag pa des kyang ngas sug chen do 'a drim nas debye ma/
162b3: khyim bdag gi chung mde/ de pag 'i ga// nam mthong nas des lag ba rnas ma 'ong shig ces byas pa dang / phrag pa des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas ltos bzung bas mgo sad dem rgya grags nas papa ras mug can de kyis bdag gi zung ma
162b4: xxx/ xxx
162b5: blar ce/ khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ phags pa khyim bdag gis rang gi mug pa na sa byas kyis zad rtsol nyig/ dgas sgrub pa/ mthas 'di de nga bar byas/ dI gas kyis dad/ rlung gro gi ma man na
162b6: chu gzhug go/ / khyim bdag gi zung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dog da/ po bsnunas so// nye dag pa slus pa/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan konas chug shig pas zlas nas la sa nyas /
162b7: xxx/ xxx
162b8: mongal kyid kyi gang langs drug cen byin pa de nyid la grangs nig/ deti ga gan du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa padag sa margyam kyi// songs kyim bdag gi zung ba da la ni// legs pa kyis bad ni

163a1: mchis zang de mchid 'bo zhing 'di skad ces khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gra ngas shig ces mchi'o/ / nye dgas smras pa/ song shig dang byin par 'gyur ro// thag pa de yang de'i gan du song ste smras pa/
163a2: khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la ka byin cig/ des smras pa/ kA'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyi mgrin par rol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o//
163a3: thag pa de yang nye dga'i thang du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang des bdag spyos te/ kri'i khyog khyod 'dug mi phod dam/ gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyimagrin par tshol zangs btags/
163a4: mnyan yod thams cad tu bskor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis 'phags pas bdag la gla stsol cig/ nye dgas smras pa/ kye nang rje gal te gang gis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo 'jal bar gyur na kho bo'i lhung /
163a5: bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas khyod kyis kho bo las bag phye'i rin dang / zhu mar dang / hwags la sogs pa ji tsam khyer bdag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang / ji tsam na ches lhag
163a6: par khyer bar gyur nas/ nye dgas thag pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la btags te btang ngo // thag pa de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar lhag pa kho na bya'o zhes zeng la/
163a7: 'bri ba kho nar byed do zhes smod par byed/ byar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba bye de dgas 'di la dag
163a8: slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba 'ayodas pa rdza ma bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du med par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang sngam bzhin te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dgal

163b1: basmras pa/ nyed pa kyad byas pa mangs pa de lta bu byas par gyur pa bananas/ btsun pa dad// sangs rgyas bamam ldan las kyis dag byung garnalas mnapa/ rjes su 'jun pa pa yin pa/ rung bas yin pa
163b2: tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas byab ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs dums rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de la bas
163b3: naphan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar byaste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / de'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di skar gdon par bya ste//
163b4: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi rlung mnye du ma yin pas thag pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma btabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig zung nas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gnas/
163b5: song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa thag pa shes par gyis shig/ gos 'dabo bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan pa thag pa gos 'di zhing che ba dang / khrun ring ba dang / thar gyis zhag pa dang / thags ngan bzang bar legs par gyis
163b6: shig/ tshe dang ldan pa thag pa 'di ltar kho bos klu rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba 'am/ bza' btsam 'am/ bza' rgyu cung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir bla rngan 'di lta ste/ bza' ba
163b7: bza' btsam 'am/ bza' rgyu rlung zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do// dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// khyim bdag cas bya ba ni skyes pa'o//
163b8: khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do// nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no// thag pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no//

164a1: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang / mes po dang / phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/ de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no// gos 'thag tu bcug pa las shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / da ni'i
164a2: gos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / du gu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / ko tam pa'i gos dang / nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o// de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'oro// sngar
164a3: ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar 'gron dus bos par ro/ / rnam par rtog pa 'ag nig zung nas shes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ag 'a zhig/ thung nas so// thag pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o// 'di ska
164a4: ces tshe dang ldan pa thag pa shes par gyis shig/ gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis shes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o// zhed che ba zhes bya ba ni rgyang che ba'o// khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni tshur ring ba'o// thar gyis zhagapa
164a5: zhes bya ba ni 'jung mdud med pa'o/ / thags ran bzang bar zhes bya ba ni byer zug snyoms pa dang / shas bzang ba dang / sang seng med par ro// bza' ba 'am zhes bya ba ni bza' ba lnga po dag go// bza' ba tsam 'am zhes
164a6: bya ba ni bca' ba lnga pa dag go/ / bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza'i rgyu'o// de la gal te dge slong des shes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dgas so// gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// gos grub na zhes bya ba
164a7: ni gos thob na'o/ / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis ji tsam du
164a8: gos bsgrub pa'i phyir khri las ldang bar byed/ gos dag dang / sham thabs gon par byed/ lag pa dang / lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/ bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/ bca' ba lnga dang / bza' ba ldo dag spang bar

164b1: byed/ tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing ji srid tu gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du zhes byas su 'gyur ro// gos thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// gal te phyogs gage mo zhig tu gos 'thag tu bcug gis de khyod kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sngar bstaH/
164b2: par gyur na srung ba med do// las dang po pa dang / spros pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gis nyen pa la snang ba med do// 'thag pa skyed pa'i snang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho//
164b3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa chos shes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa da ldan pa bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod
164b4: bzhig yod pa des ji srid tu de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid tu de dang lhan cig gnas so/ / gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan
164b5: cig gnas par brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sha lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ang 'a zhig byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dgal
164b6: bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs chur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las kyis shig ces ba/
164b7: shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das gos la dag tu ldangs rgyur gshegs kyis rjed
164b8: cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs brgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las kyis shig/ dga' bos thos te/ thos nas kyang nye dga' la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes

165a1: bar gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang bcom
165a2: ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyar 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las kyis shig ces bsgon/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid tu 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so//
165a3: ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar
165a4: 'gyur bas/ / gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag dge slong rab tu shes pa 'ga' zhig khrid
165a5: de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nye dgas smras pa/ slob dpo na re zhig
165a6: gser gyi snod spangs te sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/ khyod kyis lhan cig gnas pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa'i dod pa su la yod/ des kho bo mthong bar
165a7: yang mi 'dod do/ / slob dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / don 'thun pa gang dag brtul ba de dag las slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jud par byas pa yod dam/ don
165a8: thabs cad kyi thams cad tu med do/ / de'i phyir khyod kyis gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi rnam sbyar rnyings nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/ bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te sngam

165b1: sbyar bcom par bya'o snyam nas/ des de khyer te dga' bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang / de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos gar 'gro// des smras pa/ kha bo'i snam sbyang
165b2: rnyings te la bos ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus la snam sbyar bcom par bya'o/ / bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ gal te khyod sngam sbyar sa rapa gzhan 'tshem na snga ma sbyar rting pa 'di kho bo la byin cig/ de bzhin
165b3: bya'o/ / de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gi snam sbyar rnyings te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di skyed pas snam sbyar bcom par zhu'o// nye dgas smras pa/ gal te slob dpon 'di ni de'i dus lags so// dga' bos rmas pa
165b4: tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa de kho bos khyod la sbyin na/ / mkhan po mi 'tshal te bdag gis ras yug chen 'di las snam sbyar drubs te bcad par bgyi'o// nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos ko gzhan thos la
165b5: gzhan mthong ste/ kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsdams pa/ bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/ kho bas khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes so// ci khyod mkhan po dang mi 'thun pa'i don
165b6: yang dag par len par byed dam/ de dge slong dbang chen pos spad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no// des de blangs nas smras pa/ mkhan po khyod ras yug chen 'di ba zhes shig/ rtsa
165b7: dang ldan pa chos ci lo bos khyod la rje ba'i phyir sngam sbyar byin nas ras yug chen yang khyod nyid khyer cig/ des bsams pa/ bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci b+h+ya/ bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la 'bul bar
165b8: zhing snapa sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po zhu'o snyam nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang /

166a1: bsod snyoms pa zhig gis bslangs pas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la dul zhing snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms 'dil byin no// byi de nyin par de napa
166a2: shAr da gyon te mkhan po'i gang ba la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / dga' bos klas gatshe dang ldan pa chos shes par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag
166a3: tu ljongs zlar gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar slo ba des chos gos kyi las kyis shig ces bskon/ gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'bar rgya dag 'das tekyi
166a4: nas kyang lho gang ba bsgrubs par bya dgos so/ / ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag tung
166a5: bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro bar 'gyur bas gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig 'gro ba na re shig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/ shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag sangs rgyas
166a6: dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing / rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcubargyang/
166a7: mchis par bka' stsal pa/ dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te bdag ni re shig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs gcigs 'o// dga' bos smras pa/ 'a bo dang lhan cig 'dod do// des smras pa/ bcom ldan
166a8: 'das nyid dang lhan cig macig/ dga' bos spyos te smras pa/ ngan pa ci kho bos khyod la chos la chos nyid bzang pos skam sbyar byin snyam 'am/ khyod kho bo dang lhan cig lo/ ba'i phyir byin pa yin na gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gron/

166b1: rnam bya so ge khye ba'i byin do lda kyi lam pa dag pa mo go phrogs pa ni bla'i bdag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa dag dang lan cig ljongs cur 'gro ba ni mi drang ngo snya pa nas des de la snam sbyar byeng /
166b2: byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ shi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs byin pa 'khor dbugs byin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom
166b3: pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bkor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i gru
166b4: gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram
166b5: ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongs bso dgas mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bkor gdeng
166b6: dpon skar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis su ma ga/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bkor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar thon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur btang bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
166b7: zla bstar d+hu gar gyis tshogs kyis yongs su go nyi ma sar 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung lta dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bkor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar thul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bsko
166b8: gcig sa bza / ra bu'i tshogs kyis 'os sa gnor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag pazangs sri rnam yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs sa shor ga rgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsung gi migs kyi ma

167a1: gatshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang / spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting de ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ljang
167a2: dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
167a3: dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba cig
167a4: pu pa/ nyag cig dpa' ba/ gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa
167a5: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su spyad pa mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs
167a6: pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/ byang chub kyi
167a7: yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya
167a8: phrag bcur dbang skur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/ 'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /

167b1: maud gal 'i chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar to kos la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis na sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su gang po
167b2: che'i lha stangs kyis la las legs par ma bgos pa dang / legs par ma sbyangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam par gzigs par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lha stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na tshed
167b3: ldan pa chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma
167b4: grub 'am/ bcom ldan 'das grub bo// 'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro// des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
167b5: kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/ btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gling bzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la
167b6: sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la smras pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong la gos
167b7: byin nas yang phyir grogs pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni btu byung ba'i bya ba ma yin no nas rnam par smad pa mdzad do// de nas
167b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la

168a1: sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'ardung cing
168a2: de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na/ dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do// dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo 'am/ gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//
168a3: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o// gos shes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang / shan 'ogos dang / zar ma'i gos dang / dragu la'i gos dang / ras bal gyi gos dang / kau tam pa'i gos dang // nyin gos pa gang yang du 'o/ nan she kya phyi sbyi mi dgos pa'o
168a4: 'odo zhe bya ba ni bzhan go / thos 'thugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas shes bya ba ni khro ba ma sangs par ro// 'phrog ga ma zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so// 'phrog tu 'jud cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan no// dge slong des shes bya ba ni dge slong
168a5: gang yin pa des so/ / lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o// phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni gtang bar bya zhing ngo do// btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang bral bar byas na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs
168a6: nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so// de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ lus g.yo bar byed pa dang / tshig rjod par byed pa dang / de gnyi ga dang ldan pa dang / gzhan dag gis so// de la
168a7: ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par byed/ khrid par byed la/ tshig gis dge slong khyod la gos mi
168a8: sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces ni mi zer na ji srid du gos kyi gra lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus la bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas so// ji ltar tshig

168b1: rjod par byed pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin pa nas do'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rnam par byu gdas rangs nas dag grang kyad lags ma spyan byas kyang byan cagacas cagarjod par byed pa/ lus kyis rnam par da babyed du nga//
168b2: tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nye byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las thal bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar tshig brjod par byed pas so// ji ltar de gnyi ga dang ldan pas she na/ dge slong gis dge slong
168b3: l a gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas lus kyis kyang rdul bar byed cing tshig gis kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na ji srid dugs kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du
168b4: nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar gnyi ga dang ldan pas so// ji ltar gzhan dag gis she na/ dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros khrugs rngam par gyur te
168b5: yid ma ngas nas dge slong 'phrog tu bajud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na gnyi ga la spang ba'i ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge
168b6: slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khro zugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrogs tu 'jud na rdo srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyig la nyes byas ra ra 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus
168b7: bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong la sos byin nas de'i 'og tu khro zugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog tu 'jud na
168b8: ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid tu gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/ gos kyi gra lus las bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed/ tu 'gyur ro//

169a1: dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid marangs nas dge tshul 'phrog tu 'jun/ ji srid tugos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyig la nyes byas der 'gyur ro// gos kyi sa sus
169a2: las bral bar byed na dge tshul la nyes byas nyid tu 'gyur la/ dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du bajud niji srid du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas dge tshul ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid bu gos kyi grwa
169a3: lus las bral bar mi byed pa de sred du gnyi ga la nyes byas re rer 'gyur lo/ / go kyi grangs la tha ba byed dag chung ba nyes byas nyi tu 'byung ba / dge slong bsrung pa'i lung byed tu gyung // dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma
169a4: rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa la bsod
169a5: nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'o tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yid ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid tu gos kyi grwa lus las bral
169a6: bar mi byed pa de srid tu khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches ma du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong la spang
169a7: ltung byed tu 'gyur te/ de ltar gzhan dag gis so// don gzhan dang / 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni ltung ba med do// ji ltar don gzhan gyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i
169a8: phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang / chu klung gi kha'am/ yur po che'i khang 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang / mkhan pos chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis gos dge phrogs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas 'phrog gam/ 'phrog tu 'jungad pa ste/ de ltar don gzhan

169b1: gyis so/ / ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis she na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i zla bo dang / sdig pa'i sten grogs dag dang / lhan cig sdig bsten cing lam du
169b2: 'gro bar gyur na de dag la mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs pa dang / smin pa'i po dang sdig pa'i rten rdzogs pa rten pa gyung / mi rung ngo snyam pas gos dag 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/ de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so// las dang po ba dang /
169b3: spros pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ 'brog pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed/
169b4: kyi tshal mgoni mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ri brags shig na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des dgon par dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa mthong lung dang / srang lung dra ba can dang /
169b5: lan kan gyis brlan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gur pa khri dang / mri'u dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed tu bcug ste/ de na dge slong drug bcu gnas pa de dag la khyim bdag des chos gos dang / bsod snyoms 'osos
169b6: ba mab ba stobs par byed do/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas khyim bdag del bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du dge slong de dag dong ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi pas dge slong drug brtul chas gos dang / bsod snyoms
169b7: la sogs pas mkho bo stabs pa byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug ba cul chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mthe bo stabs par byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag la la ni rgyal bstan bkur byed/ la la ni stong la/ la
169b8: la ni yum snyen bkung byed pa yang yod/ la las ni bdag nyid kyang goso pa dang / 'bas bdag gis rngom thog go// de nas dge slong de dag gtsug lag 'a de nas dong ngo // rgan zhugs ri bregs de nyid nas rab byung pa gnyis shig sad snyoms bdus nas

170a1: shag/ gtsug lag khang de nyid na 'khod do// byang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis gtsug lag khang de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dag der dong ste tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsu
170a2: lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par 'dug nas de dag gis bsams pa/ dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/ yang na nyin mo spyod tu dong gor ma chag snyam nas de dag den yongs su bskor ba na rgan
170a3: zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis de gnyis la smras pa/ 'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gang dong de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do// ji'i slad du/ khyim bdag gang gis gtsug lag
170a4: khang 'di phyed du ba drug pa des dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho bo bstabs par byas par gyur te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la bu shig yod pa de'i gan du song ste bzhin bzangs khyod kyi
170a5: phas dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas bstabs par byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho bo stabs par byed nus sam zhes smras na/ de na re 'phags pa dag
170a6: la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/ la la ni stong la/ la la ni 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod// la las ni bdag nyid gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thog go zhes zer nas dge slong de dag dong ngo // kho bo cag gnyis ni bsod snyoms brgyas nas
170a7: gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na 'khod do/ / ded dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag yun ring po nas smon pa/ kyem bad gcag gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed tu gzhug cing gtsug lagakhang byed tu bcug nas dge slong rnams la
170a8: mkho ba bstabs par bya'o snyam na/ gtsug lag khang 'di ni byas zin pa yin pas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstags par bya'o zhes des ras yug chen bting ste/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang gis ji yongs

170b1: sa gang ba 'dang bras cag ces smras pa dang / de dgags kyang rnga 'byor ba dang bral nas dang pa myang pa 'das par byung bang da dngan gyis rgan 'grusu gnyis la smras pa/ 'bags pa gnas na nga /
170b2: zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms lagasas// 'din brgyad to dang / bcu bzhi son dade/ skyon gyi poso snyoms lags so// 'di nin pa'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad lags so// 'di ni rnyed pa lags so// rin chos gos kyi
170b3: lags kyis dge slong bzang po dag spyan thos shig/ bdag cag dbyung 'das nas 'dir mchis ted ge song rtsal ma lo ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes smras te dang / nan zhugs gcig gis smras pa/ nan zhugs dge 'dun
170b4: gyirnyed pasas smrab bya/ gcig gos kyis smras pa/ gang gnon pas so// de gnyis las gang gzhan pas rnye pa de sas nas des sgrus pa/ nan thugs minan yod nas dge slong dag yon gang gas gyu/ rgan pas smras te/
170b5: gang gnon pa 'gro bar byo'o// gnon pas smras pa/ kho bos rnyed pa sbas kyis khyod der song shig/ rgan bshos mnyan yod pa dge slong spyan du song ngo // drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis phram ze dang kyim bdaka'ongs shing wAn
170b6: parnams la yang chos bstan par bya/ rgol bdag kyang tshang gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrags par bya'o snyam pas zu sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas chadang ldan pa byedag 'argyal byed kyi
170b7: la gyi sgo 'chag cing 'dug pa des thag ring po khon nas rgan zhugs na go sla ba'i me tog ltar sna bsgrin ma 'byung ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong ba 'di gang yin pasu'o ska nas des ma
170b8: gnas brtan byin pa legs so/ / byon pa legs so// phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / den slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo zhes zeng nas te dgas bsams pa/ kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs shig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ ma'an

171a1: mi shes so snyam nas des de la smras pa/ rgan zhugs ga las 'ongs/ rari bregs kyi gtsug lag khadag ge mo zhig nas mchis so// nan zhugs ci de gtsug lag bang yin na ma/ 'on to mongs pa yin/ gtsug lag yang ni tsi dra/
171a2: phongs pa ni ci nga/ gang na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/ gdan yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yin no// de sngon ni phongs par thung ba/ da dri gtsug lag yang drugag// ji skang gung byang lam nas don
171a3: 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang / chos gos kyi zong dag phul nas 'di skad ces
171a4: 'phags pa dge slong bzang po dag pos shig/ bdag cag kyang dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong brgyal mkho bo bstabs par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o// nye dgas smras pa/ 'on tang pyod dge slong rkur 'ongs mod/ lags so// rgan zhugs
171a5: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / legs
171a6: skyes dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can mang po gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyi ma re re zhing yon bshad pa byed pa na yang gnas 'dir dge slong gang dag
171a7: ma 'ongs pa de dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par dga' bar gyur cig ces zer la/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis brel ba med cing
171a8: bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon sum du chos ston par mdzad pas 'di na chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yin pas gal te dge slong rnams kyis khyod dge slong rgur 'dir 'ongs par shes par gyur na khyod gnas nas

171b1: 'byung ba'i las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/ dge slong gzhan la de skad ma zer cig/ 'di ltar kho bo cag mi drug re re la yang 'khor bcu bcu yod pas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo //
171b2: slob dpon pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchis te slad kyis mchi'o// nye dgas bsams pa/ lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di mthong zhing de thos nas dang po kho nar 'gro bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam
171b3: nas smras pa/ / rgan zhugs khyod kyis lha ni yid kyis bskor ba yin gyi lus kyis bskor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / chos rnams yid kyis 'dran byed cing / yid gtso yid kyi 'gros can yin
171b4: zhes gsungs kyis/ 'di nyid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces des de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste rgan zhugs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// chos 'byag 'tshal god / 'an la phyag 'tshaganas kyi shig ces 'drad du bcun/
171b5: go/ slob dpon skom gyis je skom 'thung ngu mchi'o// 'di nyid tu sdod cig dang kho bos skom gyis phor bu bkar te khyer te 'ong ngo zhes des skom gyis phor bu bkang ste brud nas spras pa/ rgan zhugs song shig ces des de thag ring po
171b6: bskul nas de phyir ma ldog cig ces bsgo ste bdag nyid phyir log go/ / drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang chung zad kyi thos pade phye ma zed kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde
171b7: rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/ khyod kyis thos pa chung zhig yod dam/ yang de'i bregs kyi gtsug lag kha dag ge mo zhig tubyang lam nas don 'thun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge song
171b8: drug bcu'i dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms dang / brgyad ston dang / bcu bzhi ston dang / nya ston dang / na ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang / chos gos kyi zong dag phul gyis der dongango // ci nyid tu byang gnas par bya'am/ mi bye ste/ 'di lta

172a1: dbyar gyi nang nyid tu de dag zos te 'di nyid tu 'ongs la dbyar phyi ma nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/ / de dag der dong ba dang rgan zhugs kyis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs
172a2: pa legs so/ / 'ongs pa legs so zhes de gnyis kyis de dag gi gnas khang dag bskos shing gnas mal dang / khri dang / khri'u dang / tshur dang / phor bu dang / chu chags dang / lde mig khyog po dag phog go// de dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag
172a3: don gang gi phyir lhags pa de rje brtag par bya'o snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis 'dir rnyed pa ci grub pa dag ji bltas 'on cig/ rgan zhugs de gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas de gnyis kyis 'di ni dge slong drug bcu'i
172a4: zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms so/ / 'di ni brgyad ston no// 'di ni bcu bzhi ston no// 'di ni nya ston no// 'di ni na ba'i rkyen to// 'di ni sman gyi yo byad do// 'di ni 'di'i rnyed pa'o// 'di ni chos gos kyi zong ngo zhes rnyed pa de dag thams cad bstan
172a5: no/ / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs ser sna can yin pas zas bsod pa sbyin par mi nus la/ 'di ltar rgan zhugs 'di gnyis kyis dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pas yongs su spang ba sbyin no zhes de dag gis de
172a6: gnyis la yongs su spang ba sbyin nas de gnyis kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis yongs su spang ba thob bo zhes dga' bar gyur to/ / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong lto mdun can 'ga' zhig la bcol na des dge 'dun la nyi ma re re zhing
172a7: bca' ba rnam pa bcwo brgyad dang / tshong ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'drim par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis dge slong ste mdun can zhig la bcol ba dang / des de dag la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa
172a8: bcwo brgyad dang / tshod ma sdum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'drim par byed pas dum cung zad cig gis bsod snyoms thams cad spyad pa dang / dge bskos kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dugs

172b1: smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs shig mchis so// de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa de dag ni brgyad stod dang / ru ba ni ston dang / nya
172b2: snyed byed la/ bdag cag bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa dag de mi byed kyis de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos pa dang / dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ ched ldan pa dgang ni dge 'dun
172b3: byin pa'i rkyen dang yo byad dag gcig mchis so/ / drug sde dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid tu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'tsho ba de srid tu bdag cag rtag tu nad pa yin pas na pa'i sman de yang bza'o zhes de dag
172b4: gis de yang zos nas de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khur ya gcig ni 'dug par dka' ba yin gyis gos kyi rnyed pa 'di yang bgos la/ khur ro mnyam pas bde bar 'dod par bya'o zhes de dag gis de yang bgos pa// /
172b5: rang/ dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/ de ni dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs las ma mchis so// de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis khyed gnyis na re dge slong drug bcu'i
172b6: zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms yod do zhes zer na dbyar gyi nang du zad par gyur to/ / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ ci de dag gis bca' ba rnam pa bcu brgyad dang / tshong ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang / legs par sbyar ba'i btung
172b7: ba sha stag rims shig ces smras sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis gnya' ba smad de spyod spyod lang smad par byed kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las kyis shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis
172b8: myur du bzod pa gsol cig/ phyis bzod pa gsol na lhag pa'i spyi byi bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang / kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs 'di gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin

173a1: gyis 'di gnyis la bzod pa gyis shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis bzod par bya'o// ri brags 'di ni ma dad pa meng pas 'dir bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis gal te lhag rol cung zad yod
173a2: na de yang byin cig/ 'on te med na ni kho bo cag 'dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag ci yang med kyis deng shig/ de dag de nas dong ste mnyan yod tu song nas de dag der phyin pa dang dbyar phye mar gnas par khas blangs so// dbyar 'das pa dang
173a3: don 'thun de dag yang lhags nas de dag gis de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par mthong nas de dag gis bsams
173a4: pa/ dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/ nyin mo spyod tu dong gor ma chag snyam nas/ de dag den yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong /
173a5: bzhin bzangs dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do// 'phags pa gnyis bdag cag gis dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms ma phul lam/ de gnyis kyis spras pa/ dge slong dag lhags par gyur nas de dag gis
173a6: dbyar gyi nang nyid tu thams cad zos te dong ngo / / khyed gnyis kyis dge slong gang dag khri dang 'ongs/ drug sde dag go/ 'phags pa gnyis khyed gnyis rgya mtsho chen por dong nas nor bu mching bu dag khyer te 'ongs so// de na dge slong gzhan
173a7: dag med dam cin drag sde dag khrid de 'ongs/ de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi dad pa'i mu gra skyes ma thag tu bcom mo zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar
173a8: byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng bzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma

173b1: bzhin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la spras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis
173b2: dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgos pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu zung bas
173b3: bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la
173b4: nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du
173b5: bgo bar mi bya'o/ / dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed par dbyar gyi nang du bgo par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do//
173b6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dang / chos byin gnyis las skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni
173b7: spong ba ma 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin la/ chos sbyin ni mdo sde'i mtha' ba 'khor yang mad sde'i mtha' ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de gnyis dbyar khang cig tu gnas par khas blangs nas gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen ma go ta mI'i 'khor dam
173b8: p ar langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na chos byin gyis rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad skye dgu'i bdag po

174a1: chen mo gau ta mI las brten pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang du skyed par byed do zhes gsungs kyis/ khyed cag kyang re shig mi rtag pa nyid yid la
174a2: bya ba sgoms shig ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgom par rtsom mo// gang gi tshe chos byin gyi 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI yang rang gi 'khor
174a3: l a nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi dka' ba spyod pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de
174a4: thams cad la phan pa'i rgyu yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang po skyed par byed do zhes gsungs kyis// khyed cag kyang re shig mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag
174a5: kha ton gyis shig ces 'doms par byed cing / de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton du byed par rtsom mo// dge slong ma dag de ltar phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te
174a6: chu med pa nas ud pa la bzhin no/ / chos byin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas des yo byad thams cad kyis de 'gron du bos so// dus gzhan zhig na dge snyen sa ga chos byin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / chos byin
174a7: kyis de la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar bdag cig tu gnas par khas blangs pas de dag phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te chu med pa nas ud pa la bzhin du gyur
174a8: na khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar khang byed du 'jud nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag la kar sha pa Na dag ni mchis nas gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba mdzod cig dang der

174b1: bdag gis dbyar khang bgyid tu stsal to/ / dge slong ma chos byin btsun ma phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang / btsun ma phreng ldan mas smras pa/ 'phags ma byon pa legs so// byon pa legs so// 'phags ma su don ci zhig
174b2: gi slad tu byon/ bdag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar 'tshal nas gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol pa bgyi bar 'tshal lo// 'phags ma khyod bzhud cig dang / bdag gis 'phags
174b3: mi'i slad du lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ / chos byin song ba dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste des smras pa/ lha khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags mchos byin byon par gyur pa ni khyod kyis
174b4: brnyed pa legs par brnyed do/ / de ci'i slad tu byon/ de dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid tu stsol bar bzhed nas/ dogs rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad tu rgyal po la gsol pa bgyid ces mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/
174b5: gal te 'phags mchos byin re shig gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste/ nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go// gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa de dbyar khang bgyid tu stsol la rag go// btsun mo
174b6: phreng ldan mas chos byin la ltas 'phags ma la dam pa gsol te/ gal te 'phags ma chos byin gnas 'di nyid tu bzhed na yang de 'di nyid tu bzhugs la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed tu gzhug go/ gal te mi bzhed na gang
